courses.description:
このコースに含まれている主な学習キーワード！
プロジェクトマネジメント、プロジェクト管理、PMBOKⓇ Guide、PMPⓇ、PMBOKⓇガイド第7版、PMBOKⓇガイド第6版


プロジェクトマネジメントの世界標準であるPMBOKⓇガイドを学ぼう！
忙しくてまとまった時間が取れない方向けに、プロジェクトマネジメントの実質的な世界標準であるPMBOKⓇガイド第7版の要点を解説します。
・自分でガイドを読む時間がない
・ガイドは後で読むつもりだけど先に概要だけ知っておきたい
・ガイドの内容をつまみ食いしたい
そんなあなたに最適なコースです！


PMBOKⓇガイド第7版は第6版までの内容から大幅改定！！
PMBOKⓇガイドの第7版は、第6版までのプロセスベースから、原理・原則ベースに生まれ変わりました。
第6版までのPMBOKⓇを学んできた方も、このコースを活用して第7版の変更点や概要を短時間でキャッチアップしましょう。


なんでPMBOKⓇガイドを学ぶ必要があるの？
PMBOKⓇガイドは、プロジェクトマネジメントにおける重要な行動指針や活動をまとめた知識体系です。
勘や経験に頼ったプロジェクトマネジメントは、いつか限界がやってきます。
このコースではPMBOKⓇガイド第7版で定義されている、プロジェクトにおける行動指針となるプロジェクトマネジメントの原理・原則、そして、プロジェクトマネジメントの主な活動領域であるプロジェクト・パフォーマンス領域の内容を中心に解説します。
世界中で活用される世界標準を理解し使いこなすことで、プロジェクトに合わせた適切なマネジメントができるようになります。


誰のためのPMBOKⓇガイド？
PMBOKⓇガイドはプロジェクトマネージャーだけに向けたガイドではありません。
プロジェクトの多くのステークホルダー、プロジェクトチームにとって重要な行動指針が示されています。
プロジェクトに関わる人々に求められる理想的な振る舞いや行動を多くの人が学ぶことで、パフォーマンスの高いプロジェクトチームを作ることができます。
チームリーダーやチームメンバーのロールを担う方にとっても、日々のプロジェクトワークにおけるヒントを学ぶことができるコースです。


コースの全体構成
１．はじめに
コースの全体感を説明します。
１）コースの概要
２）受講に関する注意点
２．PMBOKⓇガイドとは
まずはPMBOKⓇガイドってそもそも何？というところから学んでいきましょう。
これまでのPMBOKⓇガイドの歴史や、第6版から第7版になって変更された点を中心に説明します。
１）PMBOKⓇとは
２）PMBOKⓇの歴史
３）第6版までの内容
４）第7版の内容
５）第6版と第7版の違いを比較
６）第7版の目次と解説範囲
７）PMPⓇとは
８）補足：PMBOKガイドⓇ最新動向（2024年）
３．価値実現システム
第7版の重要なキーワードである『価値実現システム』について解説します。
１）価値実現システムとは
２）価値実現システムの全体像
（１）ポートフォリオ
（２）プログラム
（３）プロジェクト
（４）定常業務
４．プロジェクトマネジメントの原理・原則
コンセプト自体がプロセスベースから原理・原則ベースとなったのが第7版の特徴です。
原理・原則とは、プロジェクトに携わるすべての人々にとっての『行動指針』です。
第7版において最も重要なポイントである、プロジェクトマネジメントの12の原理・原則を解説します。
１）解説の前提
２）プロジェクトマネジメントの原理・原則
（１）スチュワードシップ
（２）チーム
（３）ステークホルダー
（４）価値
（５）システム思考
（６）リーダーシップ
（７）テーラリング
（８）品質
（９）複雑さ
（１０）リスク
（１１）適応力と回復力
（１２）変革
５．プロジェクト・パフォーマンス領域
プロジェクト・パフォーマンス領域とは、プロジェクトにおける活動領域です。
原理・原則の『行動指針』に従って、どの領域で何に注力して活動すれば良いのかを示したものになります。
ここでは8つのパフォーマンス領域について解説します。
１）パフォーマンス領域
（１）ステークホルダー・パフォーマンス領域
（２）チーム・パフォーマンス領域
（３）開発アプローチとライフサイクル・パフォーマンス領域
（４）計画パフォーマンス領域
（５）プロジェクト作業パフォーマンス領域
（６）デリバリー・パフォーマンス領域
（７）測定・パフォーマンス領域
（８）不確かさ・パフォーマンス領域
６．テーラリング
プロジェクトに合わせて進め方を仕立て上げることをテーラリングと呼びます。
プロジェクトマネジメントは、原理・原則やパフォーマンス領域、プロセス標準をそのまま適用すれば良いものではありません。
プロジェクトの特徴に合わせてテーラリングをすることで、進め方を最適化することが必要です。
ここではテーラリングについて簡単に触れたいと思います。
１）テーラリング
７．おわりに
最後に講師からひとこと。


※PMBOK Guide、PMPはプロジェクトマネジメント協会 (the Project Management Institute, Inc)の登録商標です。

忙しくてPMBOK®ガイド第7版を読む時間はないけど概要を抑えたいプロジェクトマネージャーやチームリーダー
PMBOK®ガイド第7版をこれから読むけど、効率化のために先に概要を抑えておきたいプロジェクトマネージャーやチームリーダー

courses.title: Kanban : A concise Introduction
courses.bio: Introduction to kanban to visualize your workflow and make your team more efficient

Introduction to Kanban: Welcome to Kanban : A concise Introduction
Visualizing Your Workflow: The Kanban Board and Deciding on your workflow

requirements: There are no pre-requesites for this course. I explain everything from the ground up
courses.description:
"Scrum Open, Professional Scrum™, Professional Scrum Master™, PSM, PSM I, PSM 1, etc. is the protected brand of Scrum . org. Our course and practice exams are neither endorsed by nor affiliated with Scrum . org."

Three reasons to TAKE THIS COURSE right now!
The unique reasons for taking this course are:
Concise Overview of Kanban - I cover the intro to the theory you can use in industry.
Understand Kanban - In a very simple way, I introduce you to the foundation of Kanban without going into a class room..
You will have a foundation to making your teams more efficient!
Includes Narration from Christian Carvajal
What is Kanban?
Kanban is a method for just in time delivery of tasks (such as products services, support and maintenance) without overloading our workforce . Based on my experience, it is the most popular way to meet just in time delivery for a lean businesses while increasing efficiency.
Who should take is course?
Whether you are a product owner, business owner, support/maintenance/dev ops/sales team member, business stakeholder or simply someone who wants the answer to the question "what is a kanban", this is definitely the class is for you.
What will I learn?
In this class you will learn:
Concise overview of Kanban - Including Origin, How to use The Kanban Board, Workflow
The correct terminology and use of Kanban
Support/Dev Ops/Product Owners / AgileTeam Members - I give you a brief overview of kanban as used in the business work place
The course is video based with no supporting document necessary.
How is the course structured?
Each section features an overview of a particular aspect of kanban. All is based real world experience.
Inspired by God, the Bible, my mother and father, David J. anderson.
target_audience: Product Owners, Business Owners, Support Teams, Maintenance Teams, Service and Sales Teams, Development Support Teams

Someone preparing to work in a team that requires Just In Time delivery of products, services, maintenance, tasks or lean processes. Anyone who wants to know how to be proficient with Lean methods, Work In Progress Limits, Pull Systems

courses.description:
タスク分解、スケジュール作成をもっと上手にできるようになりたい
日々の業務の中で、自分や人のタスクを分解したりスケジュールを作成する場面はたくさんありますよね。
しかし、方法論に従ってこれらができる人はどれくらいいるでしょうか。
『タスクに漏れがたくさんある』『スケジュールがうまく組み立てられない』『タスクの前後関係が整理できない』『行き当たりばったりな計画になっている』『スケジュール管理の前にそもそもスケジュールの作り方がわからない』など困った経験はないでしょうか。


感覚任せではなく、実践的な方法論を活用しよう
方法論を知っているのと知らないのとでは、できることや選択肢が大きく変わります。
本コースでは、『タスクの分解方法』『スケジュールの立て方』の入門的な方法論を解説します。


プロジェクトマネジメント、プロジェクトマネージャーへの入り口として
筋の良いタスク分解やスケジュール作成は、プロジェクトマネジメントの実践やプロジェクトマネージャーへの入り口です。
『将来的にプロジェクトマネジメントに携わりたい』、『プロジェクトマネージャーになりたい』方は、是非このコースを足掛かりにしてください。


【新規追加】タスク・スケジュール作成における生成AI活用術！
近年、ビジネスにおける生成AIの活用は、もはや避けて通れない潮流となっています。
本コースの主題である「タスク・スケジュール作成」の領域に特化し、あなたの業務の生産性を向上させるための「AI仕事術」を解説を追加しました。
・AIのベネフィットと活用時の心構え
・タスク・スケジュール作成における具体的なAI活用術
・明日から使える、3つの実践的な演習
このコースで学ぶタスク・スケジュール作成の原理原則と、それを補助するAI活用術を掛け合わせ、あなたの仕事を成功に導きましょう。

courses.title: Aprende Scrum y prepárate para el certificado PSM I
courses.bio: Entiende y aprende los fundamentos de Scrum y obtén una buena base para la certificación Professional Scrum Master I
objectives: Qué es Scrum, dónde y para qué se utiliza
Por qué Scrum es tan efectivo

Tendrás una buena base para actuar como Scrum Master y poder presentarte a la certificación PSM I

Teoría de Scrum: ¿Qué son Scrum y la Scrum Guide?

requirements: No hay requisitos ni experiencia previa necesaria, sólo necesitas ganas de aprender
Todas las clases son descargables, para facilitar la movilidad en el aprendizaje
courses.description:
Scrum ha demostrado ser uno de los marcos de trabajo más efectivos para la gestión de proyectos de software durante las últimas décadas. La profesión de Scrum Master es una de las más demandadas actualmente y miles de empresas confían en sus Scrum Master para dirigir sus proyectos de desarrollo.
En este curso aprenderás los fundamentos de Scrum: su teoría, los roles que participan, y los eventos y artefactos que proporciona Scrum para lidiar con el desarrollo de productos. Además, podrás realizar tests de prueba que te ayudarán a coger confianza si quieres obtener la certificación PSM I, Professional Scrum Master I, una de las certificaciones más reputadas en el mundo de Scrum.
target_audience: Todas aquellas personas que quieran informarse sobre Scrum, bien por curiosidad o para aplicarlo en un entorno laboral
Todas aquellas personas que trabajen con Scrum y quieran tener un mejor conocimiento para certificarse como Scrum Master

courses.description:
[BÔNUS 1:] Formação Completa para Trabalhar como Product Owner ou Scrum Master
[BÔNUS 2:] Certificação Product Owner PSPO 2025
[BÔNUS 3:] Certificação Scrum Master PSM 2025
[BÔNUS 4:] Novas Provas PSPO e PSM da Scrum Org
[BÔNUS 5:] Materiais Ágeis e Apostila Framework Scrum, Product Owner e Scrum Master
[BÔNUS 6]: Atualizações Mensais Scrum Org
Formação Completa com o propósito de capacitar os alunos para Trabalhar como Product Owner ou Scrum Master e se tornarem Especialistas no Framework Scrum por meio de um Treinamento Completo e Atualizado  com base no Novo Scrum Guide.
Observe que a grande maioria dos Cursos com Formação Product Owner e Scrum Master da Udemy ensinam conteúdos completamente desatualizados, sem orientar e capacitar os alunos a forma correta de trabalhar como Product Owner ou Scrum Master.
Esse é justamente um dos diferenciais dos nossos cursos, pois todo o seu conteúdo é constantemente revisado e atualizado por nossos instrutores para garantir que todos os alunos estejam aptos a trabalhar como Product Owner ou Scrum Master.
Como o nosso propósito é ajudar profissionais em recolocação, estamos disponibilizando o curso com o menor preço possível e já contendo a Nova Versão do Treinamento com aulas completamente atualizadas por nossos instrutores.
Nossa equipe de instrutores é formada por Product Managers, Product Owners e Scrum Masters com mais de 15 anos de experiência no mercado nacional e internacional possibilitando nosso acesso antecipado a nova versão de simulados e provas de certificação.
Preparado para desenvolver sua carreira e garantir vantagem em todos os processos seletivos? Agora só depende de você, inscreva-se agora e inicie a sua Formação para estar apto a trabalhar como Product Owner ou Scrum Master o quanto antes.

courses.title: Gestão de Projetos
courses.bio: O curso perfeito para se tornar um gerente de projetos de sucesso!
objectives: Compreender como a gestão de um projeto funciona
Estimar prazos e orçamento de um projeto

Efetuar medições de desempenho utilizando Análise de Valor Agregado (EVM)

Gestão do Escopo: Criação da EAP (Estrutura Analítica do Projeto)
Controle e Validação do Escopo do Projeto

requirements: Não é necessário ter experiência prévia, você aprenderá como um projeto é executado do início ao fim
courses.description:
O curso de Gestão de Projetos foi elaborado para ensinar de forma simples e objetiva como o gerenciamento de um projeto é feito do início ao fim, passando por todas as fases de seu ciclo de vida: iniciação, planejamento, execução, monitoramento e controle e encerramento. O curso é baseado no Guia PMbok, que é referência mundial na área de gestão de projetos, sendo utilizado pelos profissionais que atuam na área há muitos anos. Você vai compreender de uma forma prática e objetiva, sem enrolação, tudo o que é necessário para conduzir um projeto garantindo seu sucesso, desde o desenvolvimento de seu termo de abertura, passando pela definição do escopo, a criação do cronograma, a elaboração do orçamento, o levantamento dos riscos, a identificação das partes interessadas e a criação do plano de comunicação para trocar informações com essas partes interessadas garantindo que estejam engajadas e contribuindo para o êxito do projeto até seu encerramento, além de fazer o planejamento e conduzir as aquisições, mobilizar os recursos para atender o projeto e efetuar as medições de desempenho utilizando ferramentas como a análise de valor agregado para garantir que o projeto esteja de acordo com o plano até sua entrega final.
Venha e descubra porque Gestão de Projetos é uma das áreas mais valorizadas no mercado, seja um profissional do futuro.
target_audience: Qualquer profissional que deseje se qualificar em Gestão de Projetos
Engenheiros, Administradores, Analistas, TI, etc.
Produtores de eventos

target_audience: Empresários que desenvolvem projetos, realizam frequentes planejamentos e sabem que precisam fazer isto melhor.
Gerentes, Coordenadores e Líderes que não têm conseguido cumprir prazos, controlar os custos, antecipar os problemas que trazem prejuízos, eliminar as horas extras e manter a sua equipe motivada.

Gerentes, Coordenadores e Líderes que desejam ter melhores oportunidades, mais reconhecimento e aumentar o seu valor no mercado através do domínio de técnicas e ferramentas de planejamento e gestão, o que é raro de se no perfil dos profissionais atuais.

Líderes que não são especialistas em gestão de projetos, mas precisam planejar bem e ter visibilidade sobre os seus projetos, sabendo "quem está fazendo o quê", qual o desempenho de cada colaborador, equipe e do projeto como um todo.
Universitários proativos que querem aprender conhecimentos que 90% dos profissionais do mercado não possuem, mesmo os experientes, e que o tornarão um recém formado de muito maior valor no mercado.

courses.title: Lean Manufacturing
courses.bio: Curso de Introdução ao Lean Manufacturing da Labone
objectives: O Curso Lean Manufacturing é para quem deseja aplicar a melhoria contínua dos processos nas empresas e ter maior atratividade para o mercado de trabalho.
O treinamento tem 03 módulos que explicarão a metodologia para a eliminação de desperdício mundialmente difundida e conhecida através da Toyota.
Com este treinamento você será capaz de identificar e tratar atividades de não valor agregado em qualquer atividade e ramo da empresa ou organização.
O Curso é uma introdução à metodologia Lean Manufacturing!
requirements: Precisa ter como abrir arquivos em Word, Powerpoint, Excel e pdf.
courses.description:
Segundo dados da IsixSigma, 69.7% das empresas no mundo usam práticas Lean Manufacturing, também conhecido como Manufacturing Lean, buscando melhorias para eliminar desperdícios, reduzir custos e aumentar a qualidade para seus clientes.
Num mercado cada vez mais competitivo, as organizações estão trabalhando fortemente em todas as interfaces que podem afetar os clientes para garantir uma entrega de produtos e serviços com qualidade elevada e preços competitivos.
Com a adoção do Lean Manufacturing os desperdícios são eliminados e os processos otimizados do início do processo, passando pelos fornecedores e culminando nos clientes, onde em muitos casos as empresas acompanham o processamento do material no cliente a fim de garantir a máxima qualidade e criar um diferencial a mais.
O que é o Lean Manufacturing ?
Lean manufacturing (manufacturing lean) é uma metodologia focada no que realmente agrega valor aos clientes para eliminação de desperdícios dentro de empresas, aumentando a qualidade e produtividade dos processos, serviços e produtos. É derivada do sistema Toyota de Produção (TPS) que tem como linha mestra a eliminação dos 8 desperdícios:
Defeitos
Espera
Super processamento
Super produção
Retrabalho
Transporte
Inventário (dimensionado de forma errada)
Pessoas
Por que fazer o treinamento de Lean Manufacturing ?
Porque as empresas estão procurando profissionais que possam gerar resultados consistentemente, e usando o Lean Manufacturing é com certeza um dos caminhos mais procurados, lembrando que uma grande parcela das empresas no mundo todo (69.7%) tem demandado cada vez mais por esta metodologia, e este número cresce a cada ano.
Sobre o treinamento de Lean Manufacturing
Este treinamento tem a finalidade de mostrar aos alunos o que vem a ser o Lean Manufacturing, seus conceitos e ferramentas (13), além dos benefícios indiscutíveis do Lean Manufacturing.
Como o treinamento esta estruturado?
O treinamento é composto 03 módulos cobrindo itens como:
Definição do Lean Manufacturing
Empresas que usam Globalmente
As 08 leis do Desperdício da Toyota
13 ferramentas lean
Exercícios
Vídeos
Conteúdo Programático:
-Módulo 1:
Neste módulo a principal meta é conceituar o que vem a ser o Lean Manufacturing, sua origem e princípios para que o aluno fique ciente do contexto e do uso atual desta metodologia.
Também serão tratados outros assuntos como benefícios, voz do cliente e os 8 desperdícios da Toyota.
-Módulo 2:
Neste módulo serão descritas e exemplificadas as 13 principais ferramentas do Lean Manufacturing.
-Módulo 3:
Será tratada a importância da Liderança na implantação do Lean Manufacturing.
Sobre o Instrutor:
Marcello Soares tem 20 anos de carreira em melhoria contínua em multinacionais.
Master Black Belt treinado e certificado em Dallas pela Accenture (George Group), responsável por treinamentos, certificações e desenvolvimento de pessoas para o negócio (Master Black Belts, Black Belts, Green Belts, Yellow Belts e White Belts) dentro e fora de multinacionais.
Realizações:
Entrega de resultado de US$ 30 Milhões via projetos advindos da implantação de melhoria contínua no grupo Aditya Birla Group América do Sul, abrangendo o desdobramento de Objetivos desde a Presidência até o chão-de-fábrica, para garantir as metas definidas e a entrega esperada.
Geração de US$ 13 Milhões/ano através do desenvolvimento e implantação do “Sistema de Operação Global” para suportar a qualidade, financeiro e outras áreas importantes das regiões da América do Sul, Norte, Ásia e Europa do grupo Aditya Birla Group, simplificando e padronizando processos e serviços.
Atuação forte como Master Black Belt, tendo desenvolvido 250 profissionais como Green Belts e 40 como Black Belts, obtendo através destes 660 projetos Lean Six Sigma & processos Kaizen concluídos, com US$ 54 Milhões/ano de resultado.
Sólida vivência na transformação da gestão através da excelência operacional e gerenciamento da Gestão da Rotina baseados nos fundamentos do Instituto Falconi/INDG (PDCA/SDCA), trazendo previsibilidade, foco e superação constante de metas.
Sucesso na criação e implantação de planos estratégicos, definindo e administrando budgets, e desenvolvendo processos de melhoria para alcançar os objetivos de curto e longo prazo do negócio.
Vivência internacional liderando e trabalhando com times nos Estados Unidos, Europa, Coréia e América do Sul, em todos os níveis hierárquicos, buscando continuamente melhores sinergias, implantando sistemas de gestão e criando valor para o negócio.
Carreira de sucesso em melhoria contínua e excelência operacional, desenvolvida em diversas áreas de empresas multinacionais como desenvolvimento de produto/processo, operações, qualidade, comercial, supply chain, finanças e áreas de suporte.
PREMIAÇÕES INTERNACIONAIS


Prêmio Rio Tinto VIA Awards 2007 e 2008.
Lucro: US$ 1.3 Milhões Projeto Can Body Stock Non-Round (redução do custo de demurrage)


Prêmio Rio Tinto VIA 2009 Awards Especial Mention
Lucro: US$ 4 Milhões/ano e capacidade produtiva aumentada em 13.000 toneladas/ano. Projeto CES 4 Passes (novo processo para tampas de latas de alumínio).


Obs: O certificado emitido pela Udemy leva em consideração apenas as horas em vídeo do curso, deste modo não podemos alterar o valor das  horas. Uma vez que o certificado é gerado de forma automática.

Caso queira o certificado de participação da Labone, basta entrar em nosso site, se cadastrar e tirar uma nota igual ou superior a 7 no exame final.

Após alcançar a média maior ou igual a 7, o certificado ficá disponível para download imediato e/ou posteriormente na seção "Certificados".
target_audience: Todos os alunos que querem crescer na carreira profissional ou conseguir um novo emprego.
Alunos que querem aprender mais sobre a metodologia Lean Manufacturing

courses.title: 制約理論「TOC」を身につける〜『ザ・ゴール』エッセンシャル講座【入門編】（75分のアニメ鑑賞権付）
courses.bio: 世界で累計1000万部以上売れ、名経営者を輩出するベストセラー『ザ・ゴール』。そのエッセンスである全体最適のマネジメント理論（TOC）を映画、原作者の講義映像、そしてトップエキスパート岸良裕司による分かりやすい解説で理解できます
objectives: 『ザ・ゴール』、制約理論（TOC）とは
会社の真の「目的」（ザ・ゴール）とは
もっとも効果的な人財育成方法とは
科学者のように論理的に考えることで可能になることとは

イントロダクション: 『ザ・ゴール』とは何か？（「学びのノート」をダウンロードできます）
映画を見る（冒頭７分）*映画フルバージョン（無料）のご案内は「学びのノート」の最終ページをご覧ください
『ザ・ゴール』が読者に問う１５の質問（１から３）: 2）もっとも効果的な人財育成方法とは？
３）科学者のように論理的に考えると可能になることは？
最後に（『ザ・ゴール』エッセンシャル講座【完全版】の受講方法）

requirements: 前提知識は一切不要です。
courses.description:
「毎日忙しいのに仕事の効率が上がらないはなぜか？」
「パフォーマンスが高い人/会社は、一体どうやって仕事をしているのか？」


そんな思いをいだいたことがある方も多いのではないでしょうか？
「成果を上げられる人（会社）」と「上げられない人（会社）」の差を生み出している要因は、努力の量や才能の差ではなく、限られたリソース（時間、能力、資金など）をどこに集中して投資したかによって生まれています。


その構造的な仕組みを、シンプルかつ科学的に解き明かしたのが「TOC（制約理論）/Theory of Constraints」です。


この制約理論をベースにしたビジネス小説『ザ・ゴール』（ダイヤモンド社）は、Amazon創業者のジェフ・ベゾス、京都大学の山中伸弥教授（ノーベル賞受賞者）などの座右の書になっており、世界で1000万部以上（日本国内で150万部以上）売れ続けています。


発刊から40年近く経ったいまも、世界を代表する多種多様なグローバル企業やMBAなど、ビジネスリーダーの“強化書”として読み継がれている『ザ・ゴール』ですが、その核心であるTOC（Theory of Constraints/制約理論）を正しく理解し、実践するのは、簡単ではありません。


本講座ではソフトウェア開発、プロジェクトマネジメント（CCPM）、イノベーション、小売、サプライチェーン（SCM）、イノベーションなど、多くの業界で活用され、日々進化し続けている『ザ・ゴール』を、アニメ映画、ゴールドラット博士の動画、そして『ザ・ゴール』原作者であるE.ゴールドラット博士の直弟子であるGoldratt Japan CEOの岸良裕司の講義で解説します。


『ザ・ゴール』の最重要エッセンスを１５のポイントで整理し、その真髄をわかやすく解説します。（カバーするトピック：「ボトルネック（制約）-流れと滞留」「生産性を測る３つの指標」「全体最適」「５つの集中ステップ(The Five Focusing Steps)」「思考プロセス（ Thinking Process）-因果関係をベースにしたロジカルシンキング）」「スループット会計」「企業の本当のゴール」）など）


本講座はマネジメントを再現性のある「自然科学」の領域に高めようとしたゴールドラット博士のメモリアル事業として制作し、映画の１部と解説１−３章までの解説動画の構成となっています。（受講修了者には、映画のフルバージョンが無料でご覧いただけるご案内あり）


講座に付属している自分自身の学びを言語化する「学びノート」をダウンロードして書き込むことで、主体的に理解を深めることができます。


TOCをベースに世界中で企業再生を行なっているゴールドラットグループのノウハウを凝縮し、わかりやすい事例を交えながら、あらゆるビジネスのパフォーマンスを飛躍的に向上させるための普遍的な問題解決思考、ビジネススキルが習得できます。
target_audience: 組織、自分の職場をよくしたいという高い志をお持ちのビジネスパーソンはすべて対象です。
『ザ・ゴール』は学生、新入社員からCEOまで幅広く読まれ、新人研修から幹部教育で幅広く活用されています。
『ザ・ゴール』を過去に読んだが実際に活用するまでには至らなかった方、改めてその真髄を理解したい読者の方にもおすすめです

courses.title: Project Management: The Closing Phase
courses.bio: Improve your project management skills and close your project with proven project management methodologies and processes

How to Become a Successful Project Manag: 1.2 Project Management Methodology, Milestone Reviews and Decision Gates
Project Closing: It’s Important and Need: 2.0 Section 2 Introduction: Closing Projects is a Formal Affair
2.1 Contract Administration: Making Sure All Parties Comply with the Agreements
2.2 Closing Contracts: A Formal Process Made Painless by Careful Preparation
2.3 Closing the Project: Bringing a Formal and Orderly End to Project Activities
2.4 Lessons Learned: Don’t Leave it to the Last Minute
2.5 Final Report: Approval by the Sponsor Signals the Closing of the Project
2.6 The End: We’ve Completed the Journey From Project Assignment to Final Report

requirements: My previous courses covering the planning and the execution phases of a project
Previous experience working in a project environment would be advantageous, but not necessary as I will take you through all the processes used during the closing phase of a project
courses.description:
How to Become a Successful and Practical Project Manager Part 3 the Closing Phase is designed for aspiring project managers, project team members and technical team members wanting to get more involved in managing the closing phase of a project.
This project management training course is a follow-on course from How to Become a Successful and Practical Project Manager: Part 1 and Part 2 and is structured around the premise that:
All projects have a beginning, a middle and an end, and
That all successful projects follow a standardised project management methodology.
Enhance your career prospects, build on your project management skills and prove that you can deliver the product of your project on time and in budget by completing the closing activities completely, comprehensively and to the total satisfaction of your Sponsor
Become a successful and practical project manager by introducing my Practical Project Management Methodology today so that you can plan, implement and bring all your projects to a successful conclusion
In this project management training course you will learn:
My Practical Project Management Methodology
Contract administration
Contract closing
Administrative closure of a project
Lessons Learned
Final Report
The course consists of:
Video presentations
Downloadable document templates and checklists
Me - students can ask and comment on questions in the discussion area and I will be available to advise on any aspects of the execution phase of a project
See you on the inside…
Jeb Riordan, PMP
target_audience: This training program will be beneficial to all project team members, project sponsors and stakeholders. Giving them a thorough understanding of the fundamental methods and processes that all projects need
Project team members wanting to get more more involved in the management of their projects and wanting to know how best to support their project manager
Aspiring project managers wanting to enhance their career prospects by practicing solid repeatable project management processes

courses.title: Jira Software Grundkurs: Projektmanagement mit Jira Software
courses.bio: Lerne Projektmanagement mit Jira von Atlassian für effektive Teamarbeit in diesem Jira Grundkurs für Einsteiger
objectives: Die grundlegenden Konzepte und Funktionen von Jira Software kennenlernen und verstehen
Einen Jira-Account erstellen und Projekte einrichten
Epics, Stories und Subtasks erstellen, zuweisen und verwalten
Filter und erweiterte Suchen mit JQL (Jira Query Language) erstellen und anpassen
Projekt- und Workflow-Einstellungen verwalten, um den Anforderungen ihres Projekts gerecht zu werden

Willkommen im Kurs zu Jira Grundlagen: Was erwartet Dich in diesem Kurs?
Grundlagen von Jira Software: Ein neues Projekt anlegen - Unterschied zwischen Team und Unternehmensprojekten
Einführung in Filter und Suche in Jira
JQL (Jira Query Language) Filter in Jira verwenden Teil 1
JQL (Jira Query Language) Filter in Jira verwenden Teil 2
Mit Boards in Jira arbeiten: Ein neues Board in Jira erstellen
Versionen und Releases in Jira erstellen und verwenden
Praktische Anwendung der Grundlagen: Organisation des Boards
Unterschiede zwischen Scrum und Kanban Boards in Jira
Ein Kanban Board in Jira erstellen
Weitere Kanban Einstellungen - Swimlanes, Backlog, Karten Ausdrucken

requirements: Grundlegende Computerkenntnisse: Teilnehmer:innen sollten in der Lage sein, grundlegende Computerfunktionen auszuführen
Grundverständnis von Projektmanagement: Es ist hilfreich, wenn die Teilnehmer über grundlegende Kenntnisse im Projektmanagement verfügen, wie z.B. Projektplanung, Aufgabenverwaltung und Teamarbeit

Hinweis: Vorwissen über Jira Software ist für diesen Grundkurs nicht erforderlich, da der Kurs darauf ausgelegt ist, Anfänger:innen die grundlegenden Fähigkeiten und Kenntnisse zu vermitteln, um Jira effektiv einzusetzen
courses.description:
Herzlich willkommen zum Jira Software Grundlagen Kurs! In diesem Kurs werden wir alle wichtigen Funktionen von Jira Software gemeinsam erlernen.
Nach Abschluss dieses Kurses wirst Du in der Lage sein, Jira Software souverän einzusetzen und alle grundlegenden Funktionen zu beherrschen. Egal, ob es darum geht Projekte mit Scrum, Kanban oder einer anderen agilen Projektmanagement Methode zu bearbeiten, bietet Jira Software alle notwendigen Features, um schnell, effizient und strukturiert zu arbeiten.
Wir beginnen den Kurs mit einer kurzen Einführung in Jira, die verschiedenen Versionen und die Unterschiede zwischen diesen. Danach erstellen wir uns eine eigene kleine Jira-Instanz, das ist komplett kostenlos möglich und können dort zusammen lernen und alle verschiedenen Bereiche kennenlernen.
Wir werden gemeinsam Projekte anlegen, User hinzufügen und die Hierarchie von Jira verstehen. Danach geht es im Projekt weiter – wir erstellen Epics und Stories, verwenden einfache und fortgeschrittene Filter und lernen, wie wir die Jira Query Language JQL nutzen können.
Wir lernen, wie wir verschiedene Boards, z.B. für Scrum oder Kanban in Jira Software erstellen können und planen einen Sprint, führen in durch und beenden ihn gemeinsam.
Ganz kurz geht es dann um die Unterschiede zwischen Scrum und Kanban und wir erstellen ein eigenes Kanban Board, das wir mit Swim Lanes, Work in Progress Limits und einem Backlog erweitern.
target_audience: Projektmanager und Teamleiter: Personen, die für die Planung, Organisation und Überwachung von Projekten verantwortlich sind und ein effektives Werkzeug zur Steuerung der Teamarbeit und zur Nachverfolgung von Aufgaben suchen
Entwickler und IT-Fachleute: Personen, die in technischen Teams arbeiten und ein System benötigen, um die Zusammenarbeit zu verbessern, Aufgaben zu verfolgen und den Arbeitsfluss zu optimieren
Agile Coaches und Scrum Master: Fachleute, die Teams bei der Umsetzung agiler Methoden unterstützen und ein Werkzeug benötigen, um Scrum- und Kanban-Prozesse effektiv zu verwalten

Produktmanager und Business-Analysten: Personen, die für die Produktplanung, -entwicklung und -lieferung verantwortlich sind und ein System suchen, um die Anforderungen und Prioritäten zu verwalten und den Fortschritt der Entwicklung zu überwachen

Berater und Trainer: Personen, die Organisationen bei der Einführung und Schulung von Projektmanagement- und Zusammenarbeitstools unterstützen und ihr Wissen über Jira erweitern möchten, um effektive Schulungen und Beratungsdienste anzubieten

Studierende und Berufseinsteiger: Personen, die sich auf eine Karriere im Projektmanagement, der Softwareentwicklung oder verwandten Bereichen vorbereiten möchten und ihre Fähigkeiten durch den Erwerb von Kenntnissen in einem weit verbreiteten Projektmanagement-Tool wie Jira erweitern möchten

courses.title: Podstawy Scrum i Agile - Teoria, Praktyka, Certyfikacja
courses.bio: Poznaj podstawy Scruma i Agile'a. Dowiedz się, jak pracować w sposób zwinny i przygotuj się do zdania certyfikatu
objectives: Będziesz w stanie wymienić wszystkie podstawowe elementy Scruma (Role, Artefakty, Zdarzenia) oraz wyjaśnić ich znaczenie.
Będziesz potrafił wskazać różnice pomiędzy kaskadowym (waterfallowym), a zwinnym (agile'owym) podejściem do realizacji projektów.
Dowiesz się, jak być efektywnym członkiem zespołu Scrumowego.
Poznasz listę najczęściej popełnianych błędów i dowiesz się jak ich unikać.
Kurs pomoże Ci błyskawicznie wcielić w życie praktyczne wskazówki i ćwiczenia.
Dowiesz się, jak skutecznie podejść do egzaminu certyfikującego na Scrum Mastera

Wstęp: Dla kogo został stworzony ten kurs?
Artefakty Scruma: Jak dzielić Historyjki Użytkownika na mniejsze elementy?
Team Estimation Game jako prosta alternatywa dla Planning Pokera
Czy lepiej korzystać ze Story Pointów czy Godzin Idealnych?
Jak napisać naszą pierwszą Definicję Ukończenia?
Korzyści z posiadania Definition of Done
Backlog Sprintu, Przyrost i DoD - Test
Wydarzenia Scrumowe: Częste błędy przy tworzeniu wykresów spalania
Sprint, wykres spalania i tablica Kanbanowa - Test
Częste błędy związane z Planowaniem Sprintu
Częste błędy popełniane podczas Daily Scruma
Częste błędy popełniane podczas Sprint Review
Certyfikat Professional Scrum Master (PS: Jak przygotować się do egzaminu PSM?

requirements: Kurs został stworzony z myślą o początkujących i średniozaawansowanych członkach zespołów Scrumowych dlatego nie ma żadnych wymagań wstępnych, które trzeba spełnić, żeby korzystać z jego zawartości. Nasz kurs jest również idealnym źródłem wiedzy dla tych, którzy chcą dowiedzieć się, czym jest Scrum oraz agile, a na co dzień niekoniecznie pracują z zespołami Scrumowymi. Jeśli obcy Ci jest w ogóle temat zarządzania projektami, a także szeroko rozumianych metodyk zwinnych to nasze szkolenie wprowadzi Cię w ten świat krok po kroku i wyjaśni, gdzie w tym wszystkim jest miejsce dla podejścia agile i Scruma.
courses.description:
Usystematyzowane kompendium wiedzy na temat Scruma i podejścia zwinnego (agile), składające się z powiązanych tematycznie sekcji i modułów. Na końcu każdego z nich znajduje się test wiedzy weryfikujący zrozumienie danego tematu.
Kurs zawiera nie tylko szczegółowe omówienie podstawowych elementów Scruma takich jak:
Odpowiedzialności (Accountabilities)
Wydarzenia (Events)
Artefakty (Artifacts)
ale także porusza dodatkowe tematy takie jak:
wartości Scruma (dodane do oficjalnego Scrum Guide'a w roku 2016),
różnice pomiędzy kaskadowym (waterfallowym), a zwinnym (agile'owym) podejściem do projektów (dla lepszego zrozumienia i poszerzenia horyzontów),
porady odnośnie przygotowania do certyfikacji
Wszystkie moduły wraz z pytaniami sprawdzającymi wiedzę, dodatkowymi materiałami, praktycznymi wskazówkami i wsparciem ze strony autorów stanowią spójny produkt, który pozwoli zrozumieć czym jest Scrum i agile oraz jak wykorzystać to podejście w praktyce. Kurs ten może służyć zarówno osobom początkującym, które nie słyszały wcześniej o Scrumie i zwinnym podejściu do projektów, jak i tym, którzy pragną usystematyzować swoją wiedzę i zdobyć certyfikat Scrum Mastera.
Autorami kursu są dwaj entuzjaści zwinnego (agile'owego) podejścia do projektów, certyfikowani Scrum Masterzy z praktyką budowaną na co dzień przy pracy z różnymi zespołami scrumowymi i organizacjami. Ich wcześniejsze doświadczenie w projektach prowadzonych przy użyciu tradycyjnych modeli pozwoliło im zbudować pełny i obiektywny obraz tego, czym różnią się miedzy sobą te dwa światy oraz jakie mają wady i zalety.
WAŻNE:
Kurs ten NIE jest oficjalnym przygotowaniem pod certyfikację Professional Scrum Master™ I (PSM I) organizacji Scrum(.)org ani nie jest w żaden sposób z nią powiązany. Zachęcamy również do wzięcia udziału w oficjalnych, certyfikowanych szkoleniach oferowanych przez tę organizację.

courses.title: Project Management Career Start - the SPARK Method - 1/4
courses.bio: Start a career in Project Management. Be confident to deliver great results. Be seen as a respected leader by your team.

Flawless Project Management Career Start: Flawless Project Management Career Start by the SPARK Method

requirements: Undergraduate / College Graduate Education level recommended but not mandatory.
Be interested in how to organize team work effectively.
Be interested in how to work with a team and treat people properly.
Willingness to start a new career in one of the most exciting areas (Project Management).
Willingness to develop hard and soft skills and see impact in professional and private life.
courses.description:
This course is part one of four-course series:
Project Management Career Start - the SPARK Method - 1/4
Project Management Career Start - the SPARK Method - 2/4
Project Management Career Start - the SPARK Method - 3/4
Project Management Career Start - the SPARK Method - 4/4


There is a new, practical method in Project Management that I am going to tell you about in just a minute. The very essence of the method is to answer on a question:


“How do I begin a career in Project Management in a fast, practical manner and have a successful career start?”


For centuries, ancient painters and architects used a golden ratio between dimensions inside their master pieces. They tried to find a perfect balance between them and to create the most pleasing pieces for the human eye.


Transferring that ancient approach to Project Management, we try to find:
a perfect balance between management and leadership,
between control and trust to your team members,
so that you can have a perfect Project Management career start and excel even as a beginner!


You absolutely need to know about this as, once implemented into your working system, you can be confident that you are beginning your career in Project Management by delivering great results and being respected as a leader by your team members.


The reason why this method is different from everything else is that finally, we truly concentrate on cooperation between team members and leadership and not on processes and procedures, like most of the courses and official guides do.


By concentrating on cooperation and communication, the most important part of Project Management, you are resolving majority of challenges immediately.


The power is in simplicity and in using knowledge that your team already has, so that you can:


deliver projects on time,
in budget and
with high quality.


As a beginner in Project Manager, you will not know everything, but guess what, you do not need to know everything! It is enough to know how to cooperate with people and create environment in which they are willing to share knowledge.


With that, you can begin and make the next step in your career!


And you are making a great choice!


According to PMI’s “Project Management Salary Survey”, only in the US, the demand for Project Management Professionals will grow, by 2020, for more than 12% or 700 000 jobs! That strong demand leads to:


a higher average salary and
salary growth worldwide!


For more than a decade I teach, lead projects and cooperate with people around the globe. I am a certified Project Management Professional (PMP® #1702088), Agile Champion and recipient of several Service Excellence Awards and Manager Choice Awards.


It is my pleasure to present to you, the balanced approach that allowed me to be seen as a great mentor, a leader and a colleague wherever I worked, and to give you the tool that is a result of years spent in mentoring and Project Management.


When I have begun my career in Project Management, I needed to discover tips and tricks on my own, I was thrown “into the fire” immediately and needed to orient myself in a completely new area, full of procedures, processes, does and don’ts. As a beginner, I made missteps, I had setbacks, worked with angry customers, but eventually I grew out of it with a vast experience.


Now, I want to share this knowledge with you so that you do not need to go through the same pains I did.


For that purpose, I’ve created approach that is now called the SPARK Method that finds a perfect balance between control and trust and between management and leadership, necessary for a great career start.


Our first task is to reduce complexity, to remove pressure of having to know everything and to start from basics. We are moving together step by step through our method, so you can come to work and be excited while building new relationships and delivering great results!


Moreover, by going back to basics and using the knowledge of the whole team, you save a lot of time, avoid misunderstandings and build trust between team members!


The reason our approach works so well is that we take a step back and teach WHY we communicate as we communicate and then we show HOW you can do it by providing you with the practical tooling set.


By cooperating effectively and treating your team members well, you are guaranteed to have more success in your projects. PMI simply states in their paper that: “Organizations that communicate effectively have more successful projects.”


Normally, you do not receive a guide how to start in Project Management without stress, with knowledge how to communicate, cooperate and be confident that you will manage. Often, without that kind of help, people resign from a wonderful career. I don’t want that to happen to you. We will help you to understand that Project Management is not too complex, that it is fun and that you can do it too.


That is what our SPARK method is all about.


A method that focuses on cooperation and finds a perfect balance, a golden ratio, between control and trust and making sure that you will succeed in your Project Management career.


From the cooperation centric point of view, the SPARK Method introduces:
communication strategy,
how to plan job to be done,
need for constant improvement,
soft skills and
leadership necessary to lead your team.


There is nothing more gratifying than, while implementing this approach, you get feedback from your team members like the one you will see below.


That being said, let’s move forward step by step...


---- Colleagues and students feedback reffered to in the text above ----


"...you’ve been an inspiration and positively influenced me to
learn and work and I will never forget that...", J.


“... a great human, manager, leader, PM in one body. I had a chance to
observe his team transformation
and the outcome was bigger than anyone could imagine. People have started
communicating and talking openly, he builds a situation in this way that people don't have to do something...
they just want to do something...”, M.


“...leaping off the page on a regular basis by being a mentor,
by leading internal knowledge sessions within his Department & Unit,
by receiving approbations for his outstanding PM performance.
It is very hard to be a manager but also a coach and mentor
at the same time but Marko succeeds...”, K.


“...very unique example of balance between recognition
of human in each employee and business results,
so important in big corporation...”, T.


“ ...I could numerate several different merits
which Marko is holding to, which from my perspective
are the ones each good Manager should follow:
trust, loyalty, open and honest communication, positive attitude to people and changes, respect, good listening.
Such working environment is the one which I, as an employee
was searching for to be efficient and satisfied in...”, K.

Undergraduates / College Graduates in Project Management or related area.

courses.title: To learn Linear programming Problem by Transportation Model
courses.bio: Balanced and Unbalanced Transportation Model

Lecture 2: Balance and unbalance transporation problem introduction

requirements: Linear Programming
courses.description:
Welcome to the course of "Transportation model"! Firstly let me congratulate you for joining this amazing series of lectures. Transportation Model is a special case of LPP (Linear Programming Problem) in which the main objective is to transport a product from various sources to various destinations at total minimum cost.
The transportation problem is a special type of linear programming
problem where the ‘objective is to minimize the cost of distributing a product from a number of sources or origins to a number of destinations. The origin of a transportation problem is the location
from which shipments are dispatched. The destination of a transportation problem is the location to which shipments are transported. The unit transportation cost is the cost of transporting one unit of the consignment from an origin to a destination.
Example: A manager has four Factories (i.e. origins) and four Warehouses (i.e. destinations). The quantities of goods available in each factory, the requirements of goods in each warehouse and the costs of transportation of a product from each factory to each warehouse are given. His objective is to
ascertain the quantity to be transported from various factories to different warehouses in such a way that the total transportation cost is minimized.
Stay tuned to the sessions and avail the knowledge.
target_audience: Operation Research Students

courses.title: PMP Prep: Fundamentals: Core Terminologies
courses.bio: Enhance your fundamental understanding and clear the PMP exam with flying colors

Fundamental Terminologies: Project Management is a Life Skill

requirements: Project management professionals
courses.description:
For the very coveted PMP exam preparation, it is required that you basics are very clear and you understand the concepts deeply. This course is one of the series of BASICS oriented courses that will be published here.
Enhance your fundamental understanding of what projects are, where they are useful, how they help organizations achieve strategic objectives. Project management is a life skill. It is being used heavily as a way of work in industries such as construction, infrastructure, IT, software development and more. The idea that two industries that are so different from each other namely the construction and the IT; they both use project management as their main way of organizing work, in itselft speaks volumes about the applicability of project management everywhere. An industry that has never used project management can also start using it to achieve better efficiencies in terms of schedule, scope, quality, cost, risk, and such. And even in our personal lives, we can apply project management.
NOTE: Please note that this is NOT a 35 hour PDU course. This is an overview course with elaborate definitions with relevant examples for you to understand the concepts in a practical way. It can be used to facilitate further extensive and exhaustive study of terms and concepts.
Disclaimer: PMI, PMP, PMBOK,  all are registered marks of the Project Management Institute, Inc.


Photo Credit for landing page: Photo by Tirachard Kumtanom

courses.title: Project Management for IT Roles (free)
courses.bio: How to successfully incorporate the key project management processes and practices into your daily basis

What can do Project Management do for yo: The importance of project management skills in technical roles
Overview of some project management methodologies
Project Initiation and Planning: Understanding project objectives, scope, and requirements
Effective Communication and Collaboratio: Techniques for clear and concise communication of project updates and challenges
Risk Management in Software Development: Strategies for managing risks and handling unexpected challenges
Team Motivation and Performance: Recognizing and addressing burnout and team morale issues
Project Closure & Project Analysis: Conducting lessons learned sessions to identify areas of improvement

requirements: There are no prerequisites to take the course, however it can help if the individual has at least a very basic knowledge of project management.
courses.description:
Are you a highly skilled technical professional who aspires to take your career to new heights? Unlock your potential and elevate your capabilities by enrolling in this course. Designed to empower technical experts with essential project management skills, this course offers a transformative learning experience that will enable you to seamlessly integrate project management practices into your daily tasks and responsibilities.


In today's rapidly evolving business landscape, technical proficiency alone is no longer sufficient to ensure career growth and success. Organizations seek individuals who can effectively manage projects, lead cross-functional teams, and deliver results on time and within scope. This course is tailored to equip technical specialists with the project management basis, the key components and strategies needed to not only excel in their technical domains but also to thrive as influential leaders within your team.


Course Highlights:
Strategic Integration: Gain insights into the strategic importance of project management and how it complements technical roles. Learn to align your technical expertise with organizational goals and objectives.
Key Project Management Processes: Master the fundamental project management processes, including initiation, planning, execution, monitoring, controlling, and closing. Understand how these processes can enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of your work.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Discover the art of collaboration and communication across departments. Develop the skills to interact with diverse stakeholders, ensuring smooth project execution and fostering strong working relationships.
Risk Management: Learn to identify, assess, and mitigate risks that can impact project success. Understand how to proactively manage uncertainties and make informed decisions that lead to favorable outcomes.
Leadership Skills: Cultivate leadership traits that inspire and motivate your team. Explore techniques to support your team in times of stress, provide constructive feedback, and lead by example, positioning yourself as a reliable and respected team leader.

courses.description:
Khóa học Agile Scrum thực chiến phù hợp với tất cả các đối tượng. Nếu bạn quan tâm đến Agile nói chung và Scrum nói riêng, thì khóa học này là dành cho bạn.
Scrum không khó để hiểu, nhưng lại rất khó để làm chủ. Khóa học cung cấp các kiến thức rất cơ bản, kèm theo các hướng dẫn thực hành sẽ giúp bạn và nhóm dự án đạt được hiệu quả cao hơn trong công việc.
Nội dung khóa học gồm các phần chính:
Giới thiệu tổng quát về Scrum, học thuyết Scrum, các trụ cột trong Scrum
Giới thiệu và phân tích chi tiết các Giá trị trong Scrum: Cam kết (Commitment), Tập trung (Focus), Cởi mở (Openess), Tôn trọng (Respect) và Can đảm (Encourage)
Giới thiệu và phân tích chi tiết các thành phần trong Nhóm Scrum: Product Owner, Scrum Master và Developers.
Giới thiệu và phân tích chi tiết các Sự kiện trong Scrum (Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, Sprint Retrospective) + Hướng dẫn thực hành chi tiết + Chia sẻ case study
Giới thiệu và phân tích chi tiết các Tạo tác trong Scrum (Product Backlog, Sprint Backlog, Increment) kèm các kỹ thuật hướng dẫn chi tiết
Cuối khóa học cũng chia sẻ một số típ hiệu quả trong việc quản lý rủi ro tốt hơn.
Ngoài ra, cũng chia sẻ đầu sách và ứng dụng ôn tập.
Ở phần cuối cũng chia sẻ thêm một số kiến thức ngoài khóa học, giúp củng cố thêm kiến thức cho các bạn.
Khóa học này là dành cho bạn, hãy nhanh tay đăng ký nhé.
target_audience: Those who want to use Scrum for their project (Tất cả các đối tượng quan tâm đến Agile Scrum, muốn ứng dụng Scrum vào công việc)

courses.title: Implementa una Mesa de Ayuda con Jira Service Management
courses.bio: Gestiona y mejora la eficiencia de tu equipo de Soporte y DevOps con una herramienta de service desk basada en ITIL/ITSM
objectives: Aprende a gestionar tickets de incidentes, problemas, solicitudes y cambios
Define servicios, equipos, alertas y acuerdos de nivel de servicio (SLAs)
Planifica y mide el desempeño de tu equipo de soporte

Configura proyectos, reportes y automatización

Inicio del Curso: Como abrir tu cuenta gratuita en Jira
Planes, características y precios de JSM
Como sacar lo máximo de este curso

requirements: Computadora con acceso a Internet
Abrir cuenta de Jira
courses.description:
Para seguir el ritmo de los negocios, los equipos de TI están transformando su forma de trabajar. Atrás quedaron los días de procesos inflexibles y flujos de trabajo pesados. Los equipos de TI están cambiando hacia enfoques más colaborativos, iterativos y centrados en el cliente, con el fin de adaptarse rápidamente y ofrecer experiencias de calidad. En resumen, la ITSM se está volviendo más ágil.
Jira Service Management (antes Jira Service Desk) es la mejor herramienta para implementar una mesa de ayuda (mesa de servicio) que te permitirá gestionar de manera eficiente los servicios de TI, sin la complejidad de las soluciones tradicionales de ITSM. Realiza un seguimiento de tu trabajo con una plataforma abierta y colaborativa. Enlaza las incidencias en Jira y recibe datos de otras herramientas de desarrollo de software, para que tus equipos de soporte de TI y operaciones tengan una información contextual más rica para responder rápidamente a las solicitudes, los incidentes y los cambios.
Atiende de forma ágil y estructurada a tus usuarios, basado en un acuerdo de nivel de servicio (SLA). Gestiona todos los tickets de incidentes, problemas, solicitudes, cambios y tareas con facilidad, utiizando los procesos y flujos de trabajo adaptados a tu empresa. Mide el desempeño de tu equipo, mientras que generas reportes y kpi's clave de tu operación.
Tanto si se trata de una nueva empresa que intenta gestionar las solicitudes entrantes, como de un equipo en crecimiento que está estandarizando sus prácticas de gestión de servicios, o de una empresa que busca una solución ITSM más rápida y flexible, hay un plan de gestión de servicios de Jira acorde a las necesidades. Incluso puedes comenzar con un plan gratuito o ya sea moverte a un plan de pago: estándar, premium y de empresa para la gestión de servicios de Jira.
target_audience: Director de Tecnología / CIO / CTO
Gerente de Soporte / Service Desk / Help Desk
Líder de Soporte / Supervisor de Soporte
Técnicos de Soporte
Ingenieros de Sistemas
DevOps

courses.title: Gestão de Projetos na prática e para todos
courses.bio: Aprenda o essencial de gestão de projetos e métodos ágeis para usar na prática a partir de agora
objectives: Irá DE UMA VEZ POR TODAS ENTENDER o que é um projeto, porque é importante saber como gerenciá-los e como os projetos são o dia-a-dia de qualquer profissional
VALORIZAR SUA CARREIRA e seu papel no seu próprio negócio ou na empresa que trabalha ao garantir que as iniciativas sob sua responsabilidades serão entregues
VAI SABER "O QUE" E "COMO" pedir e cobrar da sua equipe e dos seus fornecedores, para ser reconhecido como um profissional mais sênior
Terá a fundamentação teórica essencial e as práticas mais utilizadas para pode conduzir projetos em virtualmente qualquer área de atividade

Aquecendo as turbinas: Porque você deve aprender Gestão de Projetos
LEITURA: Liderança de projetos e colaboração intergeracional
Afinal, o que é um projeto? E um processo?
Porque todo mundo só fala em Agile
Certificações mais comuns. Você precisa mesmo de uma?
Gestor de Projetos. Quem é? Por onde anda? O que faz?
Porque Gestão de Projetos não é importante só em Tecnologia
O projeto mais complicado do mundo
Metodologias de Gestão: Porque você precisa adotar uma metodologia para a gestão dos seus projetos
Não entre na briga entre "agile" e "não agile"
Scrum e Métodos Ágeis: Como planejar
Scrum e Métodos Ágeis: Como gerenciar
Scrum e Métodos Ágeis: Rituais e Cerimonial
PMI e Waterfall: Rituais e Cerimonial
Como definir o escopo (ou produto) do pr: O que é e como definir bem um escopo de projeto
Porque e como estabelecer premissas ou pressupostos
Porque e como estabelecer restrições, limitações e abrangência
Formalização: nem tanto ao mar, nem tanto à terra
Como Planejar Execução, Equipe e Recurso: Planejando as atividades do projeto - Waterfall
Planejando as atividades do projeto - Métodos Ágeis
Em um projeto, TUDO e TODOS são recursos
Você precisa ser líder, mas quase nunca é o chefe
O que é um project charter e como elaborar o seu
Como desempenhar bem o seu papel de Gest: Gestor de Projeto não é gestor de cronograma
Expectativas, as responsáveis por boa parte dos conflitos em projetos
Gerir projeto é gerir gente e relações humanas
Porque é essencial gerir a comunicação com os stakeholders
A única certeza: seu plano VAI furar. Como lidar com isto
Como lidar com riscos, comunicação e apr: Mandar email não é comunicar. Mantenha todos comunicados
Não deixe para amanhã o que a equipe pode aprender hoje
Entregue e encerre o projeto: Execute muito e seja um (ou uma) grande Gerente de Projetos

requirements: Nenhum pré-requisito específico
courses.description:
A vida de muita gente em quase todas as empresas passa por implementar ou gerenciar projetos.
Apesar de haver um grande número de cursos focando em metodologias e preparação para certificação, percebemos que há uma necessidade mais essencial: saber como planejar, gerenciar e rodar um projeto na prática.
Para ser um gestor de projetos não é necessária qualquer certificação.
Claro que as certificações sempre ajudam e podem ser um diferenciador na sua trajetória profissional.
Mas se seu objetivo é aprender as técnicas e fundamentos mais importantes sobre como gerenciar projetos na prática, em especial se este é um trabalho complementar à sua atividade principal do dia-a-dia, então este é o curso para você.
Neste curso não vamos investir tempo detalhando ou defendendo metodologia A ou B. Na realidade, o que acredito é que não há uma metodologia certa - e sim há aquela mais adequada ao momento, propósito e cultura onde será executado o projeto.
Além disto, há aspectos fundamentais na gestão de projetos que normalmente são deixados de lado: as relações humanas. Sim, porque essencialmente a realização de um projeto é um empreendimento que envolve gente. E o papel do gestor de projetos é fundamental na coordenação e liderança das pessoas envolvidas.
Outro aspecto importante é tratar os desvios de projeto. Sim, eles vão acontecer e é importante que você tenha a capacidade de lidar com este tipo de situação.
Me acompanhe nesta jornada. Espero que você aprecie a abordagem e que este curso te ajude a realizar mais e melhores projetos.
target_audience: Profissionais de qualquer área que querem ou precisam aprender a gerenciar projetos
Profissionais que já gerenciam projetos e querem aperfeiçoar suas técnicas de gestão
Profissionais que gerenciam projetos mas esta não é sua atividade principal no trabalho

Discover how to lead a team and manage project constraints such as scope, time and resources. The course will enhance your proficiency in project management,
PMI's Project Management Professional (PMP) credential is the most important industry-recognized certification for project managers. Globally recognized and demanded, the PMP demonstrates that you have the experience, education and competency to lead and direct projects.
If you've gone through the process of obtaining PMP Certification, you have a standardized knowledge set - and the credentials to prove it. When applying for a job against competitors, having the credentials in hand will put you ahead of those who do not.
Because you will have gone through the certification process, you will have learned a standardized set of project management best practices to implement in your own company projects.
Course Outlines
INTRODUCTION

The Environment in Which Projects Operate
Enterprise Environmental Factors
Organization Process Assets
Organizational Systems

requirements: Bu kurs için herhangi bir ön koşul yoktur.
courses.description:
Dünya genelinde yapılan araştırmalar proje başarılarının düşük olduğunu gösteriyor. Ülkemizde de durum farklı değil.  Bu resime iyi tarafından bakıp, bunun önemli bir gelişim fırsatı yarattığını söyleyebiliriz.
Hızla gelişen teknoloji, globalleşen Dünya, artan beklentiler iş yaşamını zorlaştırıyor. Şirketler bu koşullara adapte olurken projeleri araç olarak kullanıyorlar. Hem şirket yönetimleri hem de proje yöneticileri karmaşıklaşan projelerle baş etmekte zorlanıyorlar. Projeler artık daha nitelikli yöneticilerini gerektiriyor.
Ülkemizde, proje yöneticileri yetkinliklerini ağırlıklı olarak, gerçek yaşam içerisinde yaşadıkları deneyimlerle kazanmaya çalışıyor. Ancak bu kıymetli deneyimlerin bir sonraki projede değer yaratabilmesi için yaşanan sorunların kök nedenlerinin fark edilmesi, ders çıkartılması, yine bir çabayı gerektiriyor. Ülkemizdeki iş yapış kültürü, iş yaşamının hızlı temposu ise, projelerdeki deneyimlerden ders çıkartmaya çoğunlukla fırsat vermiyor. Odak bir an evvel ürünün ya da hizmetin ortaya çıkartılmasına odaklı oluyor. Tamamlanan her proje sonrasında da mutlaka sırada bekleyen bir başka proje hatta projeler oluyor. Bu kısır döngü ülkemizde yürütülen projelerde benzer sorunların tekrar tekrar yaşanmasına neden oluyor, projelerin performanslarını olumsuz etkiliyor.
PMP sertifikasına yönelik çabalar da iş yaşamında değer yaratan farkındalıklar kazandırsa da çalışmalar çoğunlukla PMP sınavında başarı kazanmaya odaklı oluyor. Bu eğitim, proje yönetimiyle iş dünyasında, değer yaratmaya odaklı. Ülkemizin dinamik koşullarında, bir şekilde projelerle yolu kesişenlere, sunulan kısıtlı kaynaklarla başarıya ulaşmanın yollarını, yöntemlerini sunmayı amaçlıyor. Proje yönetimi alanındaki fırsatları değerlendirebilmek için projelere, portföye yukarıdan baktırıyor, büyük resmi gösteriyor.
Bu eğitim projelerde başarıyı yakalamanın yollarını gösteriyor, sizi de bu konuda bir yolculuğa çıkartmaya çalışıyor.
target_audience: Proje yöneticileri

courses.title: Scrum Master Challenges & Solutions
courses.bio: Explore real-world Scrum implementation challenges and learn potential solutions from experienced Agile Coaches.

To Estimate Or Not To Estimate: To Estimate or Not To Estimate

requirements: Basic Scrum or Agile knowledge, some working experience

If you are a Scrum Master, Product Owner, Team Member, Manager, or Leader that has encountered difficulties with communicating the value of Agile Estimation techniques, needs tips for helping the Scrum Team to complete committed work each Sprint, needs meaningful Agile metrics for measuring progress, and wants strategies for helping Scrum Team Members work more effectively together, you've come to the right place.
courses.description:
About this Course:
Each of our instructors have trained directly with Dr. Jeff. Sutherland, the co-creator of the Scrum framework and have over four decades of combined experience implementing Scrum. We created this course to help you navigate and think through common challenges you may encounter in your Scrum implementation.


Here are three reasons to TAKE THIS COURSE right now!
The unique reasons for taking this course are:
Experienced Agile Coaches who walk you through their lessons learned tackling real-life Scrum implementation challenges.
Free-flowing, conversational style lesson plan - we don't just read from slides!
Short video segments that you can listen to on the way to work or any time you have 5-10 minutes.


What is Scrum?
Scrum is a simple framework for working through ideas, projects, and products in a sustainable and fun way.


Who is this course for?
This is a great course for Scrum Masters, Product Owners, Scrum Team Members, Managers, Agile Leaders, or Business Stakeholders, or anyone who wants to understand common Scrum challenges and solutions.


What will I learn?
In this class you will learn:
Common challenges you may encounter when implementing Scrum
Experienced Agile Coaches walk you through four common challenges
Instructors draw from their real-life experiences to address problems from multiple angles and offer unique perspectives on potential solutions
The course is video-based with no supporting document necessary.


How is the course structured?
Each section features a challenge that you may face when implementing Scrum and discusses multiple solutions or ways to address it. Perfect if you are interested in upping your Scrum Master knowledge, starting a Scrum Master Role, or furthering your Scrum Master training.
target_audience: Scrum Master
Scrum or Agile practitioners
Scrum team members
Anyone who is interested in Scrum or Agile

Curso é dividido em 3 módulos:
- Compatibilização de Projetos: apresenta a importância dos projetos; os requisitos para desenvolvimento de projeto; as etapas do processo de elaboração e método para desenvolvimento compatibilizado dos projetos; o fluxo da compatibilização e exemplos práticos.
- Gestão de Custos na Construção Civil: apresenta uma metodologia prática para gestão de custos de forma permitir a elaboração de orçamentos precisos e seguros, além de maneira de implementar na prática sem depender de softwares ou experiência; mostra ainda 5 passos para dominar a gestão de custos.
- Gestão de Obras Perdiais: apresenta ferramentas práticas e eficientes para aplicar na coordenação das obras como modulação de equipes de trabalho, controles de produtividade e de consumo, gerenciamento do valor agredado e indicarores de desempenho.


BÔNUS
- Minicurso Completo de Orçamento de Obras: treinamento completo com mais de 4h mostrando os 13 Passos para elaborar Orçamento Executivo de Obras
ATENÇÃO
Curso de nível INICIANTE.
Este curso tem o objetivo de apresentar os principais conceitos e formas de trabalho, para profissionais e estudantes que começam a buscar informações sobre os temas.
Profissionais já experientes e com conhecimento no assunto podem também encontrar informações úteis, principalmente nos materiais complementares dos Bônus. Mas o objetivo do curso é ser introdutório nos assuntos abordados.


Curso voltado a profissionais de Engenharia, Arquitetura e Construção Civil
target_audience: Estudantes de Engenharia
Estudantes de Arquitetura
Técnicos de Edificações

courses.title: Basics of Program Evaluation

Program Evaluation for beginners is one of the most practical courses in Udemy that will provide you tons of value to accelerate your career as a Program Manager or an Evaluation Consultant. The course is designed in a simple yet effective way that will serve the need of both beginners and veterans who are working both in public or private organisations and performing program or project management functions. The course is studded with pro-tips, lessons, exercises all of which can help you to become an expert in Program Evaluation. It also includes some practical evaluation reports that will help to get hands on experience on how to write evaluation report.
The course is brought to you by Dr. Sayem Hossain who is an academic, Consultant and Data expert based in Australia. In this practical course, Dr. Sayem brings all of his practical experience of Program Evaluation from a wide variety of projects.
This is a LIGHT and FREE version on the Program Evaluation basics. If you would like to gain more comprehensive knowledge about Program Evaluation, make sure to enroll into the FULL VERSION of our course which has many useful videos, articles, sample evaluation reports and other tools that will help you to become an experienced Evaluator.

Evaluators

courses.title: Scrum Product Owner 2020 Po Polsku Kurs Online Egzamin
courses.bio: Scrum Product Owner 2020: Kurs online z kompletną wiedzą jak zdać egzamin i zdobyć certyfikat Scrum Product Owner
objectives: Pełną prezentację roli i zadań Właściciela Produktu, przegląd najważniejszych technik stosowanych przez Właściciela Produktu w trakcie zarządzania produktem.
Filary Scruma i jego elementy: artefakty (jak Backlog Produktu, Inkrement), wydarzenia (jak Przegląd Sprintu i Retrospektywa), Doskonalenie Backlogu i role
Przykłady problemów na jakie napotyka Właściciel Produktu w praktyce i metody radzenia sobie z tymi problemami
Pytania w stylu pytań egzaminacyjnych oraz wskazówki jak przygotować się do egzaminu i jak zdawać egzamin
Historie „z życia” i … zagadki
requirements: Nie ma żadnych wymagań wstępnych do tego kursu. Wytłumaczymy Ci wszystko od podstaw
courses.description:
DOŁĄCZ DO PROFESJONALNEGO, KOMPLEKSOWEGO KURSU ONLINE Z PEŁNĄ WIEDZĄ O TYM JAK FUNKCJONUJE WŁAŚCICIEL PRODUKTU (ANG. PRODUCT OWNER) I JAK ZDAĆ EGZAMIN I ZDOBYĆ CERTYFIKAT SCRUM PRODUCT OWNER
Trzy powody, aby KUPIĆ TEN KURS już teraz!
Otrzymasz profesjonalny, praktyczny i zwięzły przegląd roli i zadań Właściciela Produktu podczas zarządzania produktem: od problemu biznesowego, poprzez pomysł na produkt, tworzenie Backlogu Produktu i wytwarzanie produktu, do dostarczenia wartości klientom, tak jak to opisuje zarówno Scrum Guide™, jak i inne profesjonalne publikacje i tak, jak się to w profesjonalny sposób robi w praktyce.
Nauczysz się wszystkiego, czego potrzebujesz, aby przygotować się do egzaminu oraz by uzyskać certyfikat profesjonalnego Właściciela Produktu (ang. Product Ownera) … bez wychodzenia z domu oraz … dużo, dużo więcej.
Skorzystasz z wiedzy i praktycznego oświadczenia instruktorów, praktyków zarządzania projektami i produktami, posiadających ponad 25 lat doświadczenia w tych obszarach, współpracujących od wielu lat z właścicielami biznesowymi projektów i Właścicielami Produktów.
Kim jest Właściciel Produktu (ang. Product Owner - PO)?
Właściciel Produktu - wg Scrum Guide™ - jest odpowiedzialny za maksymalizację wartości produktu i pracy Zespołu Deweloperskiego. Jest też jedyną osobą odpowiedzialną za zarządzanie Backlogiem Produktu (ang. Product Backlog). W praktyce Właściciel Produktu zajmuje się całym cyklem tworzenia produktu: od problemu biznesowego, poprzez wizję produktu, tworzenie Backlogu Produktu, współpracę z Zespołem Deweloperskim, do dostarczenia wartości klientom i zbierania od nich informacji zwrotnych.
"Kurs ten NIE jest oficjalnym przygotowaniem do certyfikacji Professional Scrum Product Owner™ I (PSPO I) organizacji Scrum(.)org, ani nie jest w żaden sposób z nią powiązany. Scrum(.)org, Professional Scrum Product Owner (PSPO I) są zastrzeżonymi znakami towarowymi Scrum(.)org i mogą być zarejestrowane w Biurze Patentów i Znaków Towarowych Stanów Zjednoczonych oraz w innych krajach."
Dla kogo jest ten kurs?
Bez względu na to, czy:
Już pełnisz rolę Właściciela Produktu i masz spore doświadczenie w tej roli,
Zacząłeś(-aś) niedawno pełnić rolę Właściciela Produktu i chcesz zdobyć większą wiedzę w tym zakresie,
Będziesz pełnić rolę Właściciela Produktu w niedalekiej przyszłości i chcesz się do jej pełnienia przygotować,
lub:
Jesteś specjalistą/specjalistką, reprezentantem/reprezentantką biznesu, który/która chce zdobyć większą wiedzę nt. :
Roli i zadań Właściciela Produktu,
Zarządzania produktem,
Współpracy Właściciela Produktu w ramach podejścia zwinnego z innymi rolami i z innymi interesariuszami,
Podejścia Scrum, jego filarów, artefaktów, wydarzeń i ról,
ten kurs jest dla Ciebie.
Co znajdziesz w programie kursu?
Pełną prezentację roli i zadań Właściciela Produktu, przegląd najważniejszych technik stosowanych przez Właściciela Produktu w trakcie zarządzania produktem: od problemu biznesowego, poprzez pomysł na produkt, tworzenie Backlogu Produktu oraz wytwarzanie produktu do dostarczenia wartości klientom.
Filary Scruma i jego elementy: artefakty (jak Backlog Produktu, Inkrement), wydarzenia (jak Przegląd Sprintu i Retrospektywa Sprintu), proces Doskonalenie Backlogu i role.
Przykłady problemów na jakie napotyka Właściciel Produktu w praktyce i metody radzenia sobie z tymi problemami.
Historie „z życia” i … zagadki.
Pytania w stylu pytań egzaminacyjnych oraz wskazówki jak przygotować się do egzaminu i jak zdawać egzamin.
Jaka jest struktura kursu?
Kurs podzielony jest na bloki tematyczne, zawierające lekcje dotyczące konkretnych tematów, takich jak:
Właściciel Produktu i zarządzanie produktem (ang. Product Owner i Product Management)
Faza Odkrywania Produktu (ang. Discovery)
Właściciel Produktu – praktyka
Scrum – przypomnienie najważniejszych koncepcji i praktyk
Backlog Produktu
Zarządzanie Backlogiem Produktu
Właściciel Produktu w różnych sytuacjach
Ostatni blok obejmuje pytania egzaminacyjne w stylu takich, jakie mogą pojawić się na egzaminie.
target_audience: Będziesz pełnić rolę Właściciela Produktu w niedalekiej przyszłości i chcesz się do jej pełnienia przygotować
Zacząłeś(-aś) niedawno pełnić rolę Właściciela Produktu i chcesz zdobyć większą wiedzę w tym zakresie
Jesteś specjalistą/specjalistką, reprezentantem/reprezentantką biznesu, który/która chce zdobyć większą wiedzę
Pełnisz rolę Właściciela Produktu i masz spore doświadczenie w tej roli

courses.title: Agile Project Management - podstawy, teoria i praktyka
courses.bio: Podstawy zwinności, Agile vs. Waterfall, najpopularniejsze mity wokół Agile'a, zwinne planowanie i zarządzanie zakresem
objectives: Znajomość i zrozumienie czym jest, a czym nie jest Agile
Zrozumienie różnic pomiędzy zwinnym (Agile) ,a kaskadowym (Waterfall) podejściem do projektów
Poznanie wad i zalet Agile'a
Poznanie najpopularniejszych mitów na temat Agile'a i zrozumienie ich genezy
Wiedza, w jakich przypadkach lepiej sprawdza się podejście zwinne, a w jakich waterfallowe
Zrozumienie zwinnego podejścia do planowania prac
Zrozumienie zwinnego podejścia do zarządzania zakresem projektu
requirements: Komputer, smarfton lub tablet z podłączeniem do Internetu
Podstawowa wiedza z zakresu zarządzania projektami
courses.description:
Czy coraz częściej spotykasz się z terminem Agile albo zwinne podejście do projektów lub agile'owy rozwój produktów? Czy chcesz zrozumieć różnicę pomiędzy podejściem zwinnym, a tradycyjnym - kaskadowym (Waterfall)? A może wiesz już czym jest Agile, ale chciałbyś usystematyzować swoją wiedzę?
Jeżeli Twoja odpowiedź na któreś z powyższych pytań jest twierdząca, to ten kurs jest dla Ciebie! :)

Nasz kurs to kompendium wiedzy na temat podstaw Agile'a, składające się z powiązanych tematycznie sekcji i modułów. Na końcu każdego z nich znajduje się test wiedzy weryfikujący zrozumienie danego tematu.
Kurs porusza następujące tematy:
szczegółowe omówienie postulatów i zasad Manifestu programowania zwinnego (aka Manifest Agile),
porównanie Agile'a i Waterfalla,
analiza wad i zalet podejścia zwinnego,
analiza najpopularniejszych mitów wokół Agile'a,
szczegółowe omówienie zwinnego podejścia do zarządzania zakresem i planowania prac.
Wszystkie moduły, wraz z pytaniami sprawdzającymi wiedzę, dodatkowymi materiałami, praktycznymi wskazówkami i wsparciem ze strony autorów stanowią spójny produkt, który pozwoli zrozumieć Ci, czym jest Agile oraz jak wykorzystać to podejście w praktyce.

Kurs ten może służyć zarówno osobom początkującym, które nie słyszały wcześniej o zwinnym podejściu do projektów, jak i tym, którzy pragną uporządkować swoją wiedzę w tym obszarze.
Autorami kursu są dwaj entuzjaści agile'owego podejścia rozwoju produktów i projektów, certyfikowani Scrum Masterzy z praktyką budowaną od wielu lat przy pracy z różnymi zespołami scrumowymi i organizacjami. Nasze wcześniejsze doświadczenie w projektach prowadzonych przy użyciu tradycyjnych modeli pozwoliło nam zbudować pełny i obiektywny obraz tego, czym różnią się te dwa światy oraz jakie mają wady i zalety.
target_audience: Każdy, kto chce dowiedzieć się, czym jest Agile i zwinne podejście do projektów i rozwijania produktów.
Każdy, kto chce usystematyzować swoją wiedzę w obszarze zwinnego i kaskadowego podejścia do projektów informatycznych.
Project Managerowie, Deweloperzy, Testerzy, Analitycy, Architekci, Administratorzy i w zasadzie każdy, kto chce zrozumieć, czym jest Agile
Kadra zarządzająca, która staje przed wyborem - Agile, czy Waterfall?

SPOTO PMP course covers the latest best practices highlighted in the PMBOK Guide - 6th Edition and aligns with the 2021 PMP Examination Content Outline. Learn from PMI authorized PMP EXPERTS and pass the PMP® exam on your first attempt with SPOTO’s PMP training course. Updated for the New PMP Exam 2021 Syllabus.


PMP training assesses the practitioner’s competence and determines the levels of salience, criticality, and frequency of each of the knowledge, tasks, and skills required to perform to the industry-wide standard in the role of a project manager. The PMP course covers new trends, emerging practices, tailoring considerations, and core competencies required of a Project Management professional


SPOTO PMP course is covered in video lectures that explain the concepts from an exam perspective as well as how the concepts tie into each other across the whole of project management. This training course will help you understand project management both from a micro and macro perspective so that you may tie the concepts together and pass the exam easily.


Included in this course:
Full project management training is needed to take your PMP exam.
Based on the 2021 PMP Examination Content Outline
Latest & realistic exam questions for practice

The course covers the 3 Project Management Process Domain:
People  42%

All these process groups will be covered as we discuss the knowledge areas one by one.


Skills Covered/Knowledge areas
Integration Management

Schedule Management

Quality Management

Communication Management
Risk Management

Stakeholder Management
