courses.title: [Actualizado 2024] Introducción a Scrum
courses.bio: Curso completo de Scrum, Scrum Master, Product Owner
objectives: Comprender los principios y valores ágiles
Dominar el marco de trabajo Scrum
Capacitarse para desempeñar roles específicos (Scrum Master, Product Owner)
Aplicar Scrum en proyectos reales
requirements: No son necesarios requisitos previos
courses.description:
El curso de Scrum es un programa intensivo de formación diseñado para proporcionar a los participantes una comprensión profunda y práctica del marco de trabajo Scrum. A lo largo del curso, los estudiantes se sumergirán en los principios fundamentales y los valores ágiles que impulsan el enfoque Scrum, aprendiendo cómo aplicarlos para mejorar la productividad y la colaboración en sus equipos de trabajo.
El curso ofrece una amplia cobertura del marco de trabajo Scrum, incluyendo sus roles, eventos y artefactos clave. Los participantes adquirirán conocimientos sólidos sobre los roles de Scrum Master, Product Owner y Equipo de Desarrollo, así como sobre la planificación de Sprints, las reuniones diarias de Scrum, las revisiones de Sprint y las retrospectivas.
Al finalizar el curso, los participantes estarán equipados con las habilidades y el conocimiento necesarios para liderar la implementación de Scrum en sus organizaciones, mejorar la eficiencia del equipo y lograr resultados excepcionales en proyectos complejos y cambiantes.


Los objetivos principales de aprendizaje del curso de Scrum son los siguientes:


Comprender los principios y valores ágiles: Uno de los principales objetivos del curso Scrum es que los participantes comprendan los principios y valores que sustentan la metodología ágil. Esto incluye conceptos como la entrega incremental, la colaboración del equipo, la retroalimentación continua y la adaptación al cambio.
Dominar el marco de trabajo Scrum: El curso de Scrum busca que los estudiantes adquieran un conocimiento profundo del marco de trabajo Scrum, incluyendo sus roles (Scrum Master, Product Owner y Equipo de Desarrollo), eventos (Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, Sprint Retrospective) y artefactos (Product Backlog, Sprint Backlog, Incremento).
Capacitarse para desempeñar roles específicos: El curso incluye capacitación específica para que los participantes asuman roles como Scrum Master o Product Owner. Estos roles conllevan responsabilidades únicas dentro de un equipo Scrum, y es importante que los estudiantes comprendan cómo llevar a cabo estas funciones de manera efectiva.
Aplicar Scrum en proyectos reales: Un objetivo clave de un curso de Scrum es preparar a los participantes para aplicar la metodología en proyectos del mundo real. Esto implica enseñarles cómo iniciar y llevar a cabo un proyecto Scrum, cómo interactuar con los interesados y cómo medir el éxito de un proyecto utilizando Scrum.
target_audience: El curso de Scrum va dirigido a profesionales, líderes de proyectos, desarrolladores de software, equipos de trabajo, y cualquier persona interesada en aprender y aplicar el marco de trabajo ágil Scrum en sus proyectos y organizaciones. No se limita a un área o industria específica, ya que Scrum puede ser aplicado en diversos contextos, desde desarrollo de software hasta marketing, gestión de proyectos, manufactura y más. También es valioso para aquellos que deseen mejorar la colaboración, la eficiencia y la adaptabilidad en su forma de trabajar. En resumen, el curso está abierto a cualquier persona que busque mejorar su enfoque de trabajo y alcanzar resultados exitosos mediante la implementación de Scrum.

courses.title: Stakeholder Engagement Strategies - Part 02
courses.bio: Effectively influence and manage stakeholder engagement, interests, and expectations for better project results
requirements: None
courses.description:
This is part two of a two-part course.
Stakeholder management is one of the key soft skills a project manager needs. Keeping your stakeholders engaged and happy is critical for maintaining good stakeholder relationships.
Engaging stakeholders requires a different range of skills than those needed for managing team members. For effective stakeholder management, you need to possess the ability to choose the right communication style and techniques, depending on different situations and stakeholders.
You will understand the process of identifying the different stakeholders of a project. You will also go through the basics of stakeholder analysis following their identification, which allows you to determine each stakeholder's level of interest, power, engagement, and satisfaction in relation to a project. The goal of project stakeholders’ identification and analysis is the creation of an accurate communication plan that will ensure efficient collaboration between all parties involved in a project.

Along this course, you will learn how to:
Identify stakeholders
Apply stakeholder identification methods: Circle, Mind Mapping, Wheel
Create and maintain a stakeholder register
Classify stakeholders
Elaborate a stakeholder map
Develop a stakeholder engagement plan
Set a stakeholder communication strategy
Deal with difficult stakeholders


Enrol in this Stakeholder Engagement Strategies course and improve your influencing skills and develop the high-level competence required to manage diversity, generate buy-in and effective collaboration from key stakeholders, and remove obstacles to project progress and success.
target_audience: Functional and line managers from all industry sectors
Project Managers
Programme Managers
Portfolio managers
Business analysts
Professionals dealing with stakeholders regularly

courses.title: プロダクトマネジメント実践講座: シリコンバレー企業の現役PMが伝授する、プロダクトの成長を加速するロードマップの書き方
courses.bio: シリコンバレー企業達がどこよりも先駆けて未来を作り出せるのはなぜか？革新的なプロダクトを世に送り出しながら継続した進化がどうして可能なのか？機能するロードマップのありかたを様々な角度から解説。
objectives: プロダクトを作る時の見通しをたてる、ロードマップの現代的な役割と意味が理解できる
ロードマップを作るときに必要な考え方、道具およびその使い方がわかる
ロードマップを決めるときに必ず起こる優先度づけについて、シリコンバレー企業で行われる方法を理解できる。
ロードマップを作る時、また出来上がったロードマップを伝える時のコミュニケーションのしかたを理解できる。
既にあるロードマップをアップデートするときに気をつけなければならないことがわかる。
requirements: 特に前提条件はありません。
courses.description:
みなさんが今や当たり前のように使うSaaSにせよ、モバイルアプリにせよ、そのプロダクトの進化は留まるところを知りません。ですが、こうした進化の「方向性」とはどのように決めるのでしょうか？このために必要な考え方がプロダクトロードマップです。プロダクトとはただ闇雲に機能追加しても、デザインだけ美しても、その価値がユーザーに届き続けない限りはいずれ使われなくなります。この進化の方向性を決め、プロダクトに携わる多くの人が同じ目線に立ち、場合によっては市場に対して未来を示すところにプロダクトロードマップの本質があります。
この講座ではシリコンバレー企業で使われるロードマップの作成に必要な考え方やツール、コミュニケーションのしかた、優先度をどのように決めるのか、どのようにアップデートしていくのか、といった極めて実践的な内容をお伝えしていきます。
コース修了時には、これまで曖昧だったプロダクトの未来像を決めることがより取り組みやすくなり、ひいては会社におけるプロダクトに携わる全ての人々をワクワクさせつつも納得感高いロードマップが描けるようになると思います。
target_audience: プロダクトマネージャーとしてプロダクト開発に従事されている方（BtoB, BtoCに関わらず）
SaaSビジネスやモバイルアプリ、ソフトウェアを活用したハードウェアプロダクトの事業開発担当者
DXを活用したプロダクトに従事しているが、PoC止まりでどのように先々の絵を描くかよくわらない方
プロダクトの行く末がどのように決まるのかを知りたいマーケターや営業、カスタマーサクセス、カスタマーサポートの方

courses.title: Gestão Ágil com Scrum COMPLETO + 3 Cursos EXTRAS
courses.bio: Indiscutivelmente o mais completo: gestão ágil de projetos com SCRUM Agile, Liderança, Negociação e Produtividade.
objectives: Dominará as técnicas do SCRUM, as quais trarão sucesso aos seus projetos, lhe proporcionarão melhores oportunidades e aumentarão o seu valor no mercado
SEM DÚVIDA você será muito bem reconhecido e remunerado no mercado, pois dominará algo valioso para as empresas e que menos de 5% dos profissionais dominam
Mais de 60 aulas e 7h de conteúdo PRÁTICO e de ALTO NÍVEL!
Receberá gratuitamente *ferramentas e templates* para aplicar de imediato na sua empresa ou na empresa que você trabalha
[Extra 01] Incluso mini curso de liderança
[Extra 02] Incluso mini curso de negociação
[Extra 03] Incluso curso completo de GTD (Getting Thinks Done) - técnica de produtividade pessoal
[Extra 04] 1h de consultoria/coaching particular com Gustavo Farias com 50% de desconto
Um certificado digital de conclusão é entregue para os estudantes que completarem o curso
requirements: Nenhum outro material, conhecimento ou software será necessário, tudo será disponibilizado no curso.
courses.description:
Você sabia que 76% dos projetos do mundo inteiro falham e o principal motivo é a deficiência em sua gestão?


---
Habilidades de gestão de projetos são aplicáveis em todos os setores do mercado e, por isso, são também as mais relevantes que você pode desenvolver para crescer mais rápido e ter sucesso profissional na sua área de atuação.
---


## CURSO DE SCRUM MAIS VENDIDO DA UDEMY, COM MAIS DE 50.000 ALUNOS


SEM DÚVIDA, este é o curso de SCRUM (Scrum Agile - Metodologia Ágil) mais simples, completo, prático e objetivo que você encontrará na internet. É ainda o único curso que vai além e oferece gratuitamente vários outros cursos extras para sua formação complementar em habilidades interpessoais que potencializarão seus resultados: Liderança, Negociação, Produtividade e Mentoria em um só curso!
Neste curso, você não apenas aprenderá sobre o Scrum e seus papéis essenciais, mas também irá aprender quais são e como desenvolver as habilidades para assumir os papéis de Scrum Master ou Product Owner, multiplicando as suas oportunidades no mercado.


ALERTA.: se você gosta de muita teoria, decoreba e "blá blá blá" difícil até mesmo de entender, cuidado. Este curso é extremamente simples e prático, onde você entenderá tudo rápido e facilmente, receberá modelos prontos para aplicar nos seus projetos e gerenciará um projeto simulado com scrum (o mais famoso dos métodos ágeis) do início ao fim utilizando um sistema online de gestão de projetos.
Scrum Agile / Agile Management: "A arte de fazer o dobro do trabalho na metade do tempo".

Você dominará não apenas o método agile para gerenciamento de projetos, mas também tudo o que precisa para ser alguém diferenciado, reconhecido e capaz de conquistar grandes oportunidades no mercado de trabalho.

Projectical SAS, compañía colombiana con presencia global, ha creado el ÚNICO curso que integra perfectamente:

LO QUE NOS DIFERENCIA DE OTROS CURSOS

courses.title: Project Management Expert: Stakeholder Management
courses.bio: Project Management Expert: Stakeholder Management. Become an expert in stakeholder analysis and stakeholder management
requirements: No previous knowledge required
courses.description:
Project Management Expert: Stakeholder Management
HOW DOES THIS COURSE FIT IN PROJECT MANAGEMENT?
Project Management is a very broad field. Multiple skills are needed in project management. A good project manager masters all the important project management techniques, skills, theories. One of these relevant project management skills is stakeholder management. In the most concise terms, you need to be able to:
Map stakeholders. Who are these stakeholder?
Categorize stakeholders. In which category do these stakeholders fit best?
Engage stakeholders. How do I deal with these different groups of stakeholder?
This course equips you with this information in the most concise way possible. How? Well, we integrate those theories and those tools in the course of which we are very sure that they are practical and used abundantly in practice. By doing this, you obtain a valuable project management skill, ready to apply tomorrow during a project, in the most efficient way possible.
SIX SIGMA ACADEMY AMSTERDAM
You will be trained by Six Sigma Academy Amsterdam or SSAA. Six Sigma Academy Amsterdam is a well established training institute based on a cooperation of various university lecturers form Holland with the goal of making academic quality education more accessible, more convenient and more affordable.
target_audience: People who are involved in project management

requirements: Aucun
courses.description:
Devenir Product Owner /Business analyst agile de A à Z
Préparez-vous à un poste de Product Owner en apprenant l'état d'esprit, les compétences, les responsabilités et les meilleures pratiques de PO nécessaires
LA DEMANDE DU PRODUCT OWNER CONTINUE DE SE DÉVELOPPER ALORS QUE DE PLUS EN PLUS D'ORGANISATIONS ADOPTENT AGILE SCRUM.
CE COURS VOUS ENSEIGNERA LES CONNAISSANCES ET COMPÉTENCES FONDAMENTALES DONT VOUS AVEZ BESOIN POUR ÊTRE UN BON PRODUCT OWNER PO
Le Product Owner (PO) est le rôle le plus critique dans Agile Scrum. Ils sont responsables de communiquer avec les clients, de comprendre leurs désirs et leurs besoins, puis de collaborer avec l'équipe de développement pour créer un produit - un logiciel, un service ou un processus - qui répond aux besoins identifiés.
Dans ce cours, nous vous préparons à ce poste de Product Owner. Nous vous expliquerons l'état d'esprit, les responsabilités, les activités, les compétences, les meilleures pratiques et les concepts de base que vous devrez connaître pour être un Product Owner (PO) performant.


Pourquoi devenir Product Owner en premier lieu ?
1. Gains potentiels - Soyons honnêtes, c'est la principale raison pour laquelle nous travaillons en premier lieu. Ainsi, vous serez heureux d'apprendre qu'un Product Owner (PO) est un poste bien rémunéré. Continuez à augmenter la valeur que vous apportez grâce à l'étude et à la formation, et imaginez combien vous pourriez finir par gagner !
2. Croissance de l'emploi - Avec l'abondance d'organisations adoptant Agile et Scrum, le rôle de Product Owner a bénéficié d'une croissance annuelle et a été déclaré emploi émergent par LinkedIn. Il n'y a pas de meilleur moment que maintenant pour apprendre les bases nécessaires pour être un Product Owner.
3. Tremplin de carrière - Les compétences que vous acquérez en tant que Product Owner sont cruciales pour de nombreuses autres professions, allant des affaires à l'informatique. Ce cheminement de carrière n'est pas seulement un emploi, c'est un investissement dans votre avenir, peu importe où la vie vous mène.
4. Résultats satisfaisants - Être capable d'influencer positivement et de prendre des décisions qui façonnent la valeur qu'un produit offre aux clients génère un sentiment d'accomplissement et d'épanouissement. Et c'est probablement l'une des principales raisons pour lesquelles le Product Owner moyen est très satisfait de son travail.
5. Ce n'est jamais ennuyeux - Les besoins des entreprises et des clients changent et évoluent constamment, et votre produit doit rester à jour. Cela peut signifier de nouvelles fonctionnalités, une modification du flux de travail, une expérience client mise à jour ou l'ajustement de votre produit pour répondre aux besoins d'un nouveau segment de marché. Ce n'est jamais ennuyeux car il y a toujours une valeur ajoutée qui peut être apportée.




Donc, si vous recherchez une carrière stimulante et enrichissante, je vous encourage fortement à envisager sérieusement de devenir Product Owner !
target_audience: Les personnes qui cherchent à changer de carrière et les récents diplômés universitaires

requirements: Não é necessário ter conhecimento prévio. O curso apresenta todos os fundamentos essenciais para você gerenciar seu projeto no Microsoft Project.
courses.description:
Curso destinado a profissionais que trabalham ou almejam trabalhar com gerenciamento de projetos. Nesse sentido, esse curso ensina as etapas fundamentais para você gerenciar o seu projeto de forma consistente, desde a fase de planejamento e elaboração do cronograma, até a fase de acompanhamento e controle do projeto por meio da poderosa ferramenta Microsoft Project 2016.

O grande diferencial desse curso é justamente a implementação do software Sensei Schedule Analyzer™ na fase de análise do cronograma, de modo que você irá construir cronogramas reais e executáveis, em outras palavras, mais propício ao sucesso. Obs.: Nesse curso é ensinado como instalar a versão teste do Sensei Schedule Analyzer™ gratuitamente para que os alunos possam acompanhar as aulas e praticar.
Ademais, o curso aborda desde conceitos básicos até avançados de modo que você sairá com um conhecimento sólido sobre como gerenciar um projeto por meio da ferramenta MS Project.

[SEÇÃO BÔNUS] - INTRODUÇÃO AO GERENCIAMENTO DE PROJETOS

courses.description:
Não há curso no Brasil com mais detalhes das funcionalidades do que este.
O Project 2016 ajuda você a se manter organizado com funcionalidades simples que tornam mais fácil planejar, executar e manter seus projetos sob controle. Organize-se e mantenha seus projetos sob controle com a melhor ferramenta de gerenciamento de projetos existente.
O curso completo de MS Project 2016 possui 94 vídeo aulas, neste curso o aluno aprenderá trabalhar com o Microsoft Project 2016 para planejar e gerenciar seus projetos.
Durante todo o curso serão apresentados exercícios práticas para que o aluno possa assimilar todo conteúdo de forma efetiva, utilizando exemplos reais do dia a dia de um gerente de proejtos.
Adquira já o curso e aprenda a planejar e acompanhar seus projetos.

O Microsoft Project 2016 oferece meios abrangentes e funcionais para o gerenciamento de projetos eficiente, possibilitando ao profissional que domina esta ferramenta um diferencial no mercado.
Após a conclusão deste curso, você saberá lidar com grandes projetos, realizar um planejamento assertivo, a resolver a superalocação de recursos, problema do caminho crítico, acompanhar a evolução do projeto, as melhores formas de atualizar o projeto e também analisar os resultados de seus projetos através dos inúmeros relatórios e visões disponibilizadas no Microsoft Project.
Capacitar o aluno na ferramenta do Microsoft Project 2016, onde irá aprender de forma rápida e objetiva como planejar, controlar seus projetos de forma eficiente, definir tarefas, controlar recursos e custos, acompanhar a execução e emitir relatórios gerenciais. O curso é um ponto de partida para o profissional que quer ingressar na área de planejamento e gerenciamento de projetos para posteriormente, se desejar, obter certificação. O aluno que participa deste treinamento será um grande diferencial no mercado de trabalho.
target_audience: Este curso é destinado a profissionais que atuam com projetos, sejam iniciantes ou avançado e que desejam melhorar o acompanhamento de seus projetos e se preparar para certificação MCTS do Microsoft Project 2013/2016

courses.description:
O curso de BPM, BPMN e Modelagem de Processos com Bizagi tem o objetivo de dar compreensão e apresentar como deve ser o trabalho prático para realizar o mapeamento de processos de negócios, para obter o AS IS, que é uma das fases do mapeamento.
A fase do AS IS (modelar a versão atual do processo) é a base para a Gestão de Processos, neste sentido, este curso apresenta conteúdo e demonstra os conceitos aplicados para um trabalho de mapeamento de processos com exercícios práticos.
Durante todo o curso, abordaremos conceitos utilizados na prática de forma que você possa aplicar no seu dia a dia independentemente da sua linha de trabalho.  Não importa se seja você é um colaborador, um empresário, um consultor ou um servidor público. Conhecer o seu negócio através da modelagem de processos reais é uma forma eficaz de descobrir o que você precisa melhorar no seu negócio. Por isso, o Analista de Processos no século XXI é o profissional com conhecimentos, técnicas e habilidades para:
· Descobrir
· Entender
· Representar
· Avaliar
· Recomendar
· Projetar Melhorias e Transformações nos processos analisados.
Ou seja, para ajudar as organizações na conquista dos objetivos, um Analista de Processos precisa dominar princípios, técnicas e práticas modernas de levantamento, modelagem com BPMN 2.0, análise, diagnóstico, medição, melhoria e transformação de processos.
Ser um Analista de Processos no século XXI é uma realidade completamente diferente das práticas de décadas anteriores (OEM, OSM, TQM, BPI etc.).
Para atingir esse objetivo e para viabilizar a mudança que tanto precisamos nas organizações, eu elaborei inicialmente a construção deste curso, como também, recentemente, atualizei todas as vídeo aulas. Desde sua publicação, o curso consta como a “Classificação Mais Alta”, temos mais de 5000 mil alunos treinados e um índice de satisfação bem acima da média, sendo referência no Brasil e no mundo.
target_audience: Analistas de Processos
Analistas de Negócio
Analistas de Sistemas
Analistas de Requisitos
Administradores
Desenvolvedores
Empreendedores
Estudantes e interessados no tema

courses.title: Personalizando Jira Software
courses.bio: Exprime el valor de Jira aprendiendo a configurarlo para adaptarlo a las necesidades particulares de tu proyecto
objectives: Adaptar Jira a las particularidades de tu proyecto
Crear tipos de tareas personalizados
Generar flujos de trabajo avanzados y mucho más completos
Crear nuevos tableros
Diseñar paneles de control generales y de sistema

Pesonalización de flujos de trabajo: Ejercicio de personalización de flujos de trabajo
Personalización de trableros: Test de evaluación de la unidad

requirements: Conocimientos básicos de Jira (como por ejemplo mi otro curso de introducción a Jira)
Dispositivo con conexión a Internet
courses.description:
¡Hola!
¿Estás trabajando con Jira Software Cloud pero has notado que la configuración por defecto no se adapta bien a las necesidades de tu proyecto?
No estás solo, porque es algo que nos ha pasado a casi todos los que trabajamos con Jira.
Para mí, la potencia de Jira está ligada a poder configurarlo y adaptarlo a las particularidades de cada proyecto. Es como hacerse un traje a medida.
Con este curso conocerás los distintos aspectos personalizables de Jira para saber cómo adaptar los distintos componentes de Jira a las necesidades particulares de tu proyecto.
Aprenderás a:
Crear nuevos tipos de incidencias para que puedas representar todos los tipos de tareas distintos que en los que trabajas en tu proyecto.
Crear nuevos flujos de trabajo con nuevos estados y nuevas transiciones mucho más completas para hacer que tu flujo de trabajo sea a prueba de bombas.
Crear nuevos tableros y adaptarlos a las necesidades de información de cada stakeholder, como tableros muy detallados para el equipo y tableros más generales para dirección.
Crear paneles de control para controlar todas las métricas del proyecto desde una misma pantalla.
Para este curso es necesario tener unas nociones básicas de Jira. Si no conoces Jira todavía, te recomiendo que hagas primero mi curso de Introducción a Jira para proyectos Kanban.
Las lecciones se centran en los elementos principales de Jira, y están divididos de manera que te sirvan para resolver dudas más adelante cuando estés ya gestionando tu proyecto.
Además practicarás los conceptos de cada lección con pequeñas tareas que te ayudarán a afianzar lo aprendido. Y si tienes alguna duda que no queda resuelta con el vídeo, yo estaré disponible para contestar tus preguntas.
Por último, a aquellos alumnos que completen el curso les ofreceré una sesión individual gratuita de consultoría para resolver las dudas que tengan al configurar su primer proyecto de Jira.
Así que si estás listo para aprender y quieres llevar tu gestión de Jira al siguiente nivel, apúntate y empecemos juntos con la primera lección.
¡Bienvenido!


Nota: Gracias a los comentarios de los compañeros que han realizado el curso, supe que el volumen del audio era muy bajo en algunos casos, así que he actualizado los vídeos para que el volumen sea más alto.
target_audience: Usuarios de Jira que quieran aprender a personalizar y adaptar su instancia de Jira

courses.title: Scrum Master:in (v.2020)
courses.bio: inklusive Prüfungsvorbereitung zur Scrum Master Zertifizierung
objectives: den Scrum Guide anwenden (neueste Version vom November 2020)
in einem Scrum Team die Rolle des Scrum Masters einnehmen
Teil eines Scrum Teams sein
sich gezielt auf die Zertifizierung (PSM I bei der Scrum-Org) vorbereiten
Scrum und Agilität in ihrem Unternehmen unterstützen und vorantreiben
*NEU*: Zusatzmodul zum Thema Management 3.0

Agile Praktiken: Entwickeln Sie ein Zoospiel (ComputerZoo) für Kinder.
Skalierung und Prüfungsvorbereitung: Tipps und Tricks für die PSM1 Prüfung

requirements: Interesse an Unternehmensorganisation und Teamarbeit
courses.description:
Herzlich Willkommen zu Ihrem Scrum Master:in Kurs!
gestiegene Komplexität und Veränderungsgeschwindigkeit zwingt Unternehmen zum Umdenken. Man erkennt, dass herkömmliche Modelle zur Projektabwicklung und hierarchisches Vorgehen in der Linie zunehmend schlechtere Ergebnisse liefern. Agile Methoden bieten einen besseren Ansatz für den Umgang mit Komplexität. Scrum nimmt eine besondere Stellung innerhalb der agilen Methoden ein. Das Rahmenwerk wurde ursprünglich für die Softwareentwicklung beschrieben, ist aber so allgemein gehalten, dass es auch in anderen Bereichen eingesetzt werden kann.
Dieses Training eignet sich für alle, die in agile Projekte involviert sind und die Regeln und Begriffe von Scrum verstehen möchten.
Darüber hinaus kann das Training eine gute Basis für die Zertifizierung zum/zur  Scrum Master:in sein.
Dieser Kurs hat bereits hunderte Teilnehmer:innen auf dem Weg zum "Professional Scrum Master 1" der Scrum-Org begleitet. Viele ehemalige Teilnehmer:innen sind heute erfolgreich als Scrum Master:in oder auch agile Coach tätig.
Sie erhalten über das Basiswissen aus dem Scrum Guide vom November 2020 hinaus, wertvolle Tips für den agilen Alltag und wir gehen auf mögliche Herausforderungen ein.


Trainingsinhalte:
Der Scrum Guide (aktuelle Version Nov. 2020)  mit seinen Rollen, Events und Artefakten
Agile Prinzipien und Werte
Selbstorganisierte Teams
Servant Leadership
Skalierung von Agilität im Unternehmen
Zusatzmodul: Management 3.0


***  NEU: Begleite mich auf meinen Spaziergängen und lerne unterwegs, wie Scrum in einem Beispielprojekt umgesetzt wird.  ***


Und das sagen unsere Teilnehmer:innen:
Claudia S.
"... die Videos fand ich toll, zumal Sie dort auch zu sehen waren und nicht nur die Folien vorgelesen, sondern auch unter Zuhilfenahme eines Flipcharts etc. erklärt haben. Dadurch habe ich sehr gut das Wissen aufnehmen und auch bis heute im Kopf behalten können!!   "


Björn F.
" ... Ich schaue mir akt. Ihr Udemy-Seminar zum Thema "Scrummaster" an, welches ich sehr gut finde.  Ich wende Scrum in meinem Softwareentwicklungs-Team bereits an, lerne aber trotzdem noch in Ihrem Seminar hinzu. Nun beabsichtige ich auch, den Scrummaster als Zertifizierung durchzuführen.   "


Dr. Laura P.
"Hallo Nadine,   a) kurz die Info, dass ich gestern die Masterprüfung mit 88% bestanden habe und b) nochmal vielen Dank für die spitze Vorbereitung, den kurzatmigen/spannenden Kurs mit den vielen praktischen Tipps & Anekdoten.  "




Ich freue mich auf Sie!
Ihre Nadine Wischmeier
target_audience: Alle, die sich für die agile Arbeitsweise interessieren
Alle, die Teil eines Scrum (agile) Teams sind oder sein werden
Alle, die ihrer Karriere neuen Schwung verleihen wollen
Alle, die ein Zertifikat zum Scrum Master anstreben

requirements: Não é necessário conhecimento prévio, este treinamento passa por toda a gestão de um projeto dentro do software, desde o início do processo.
courses.description:
Se você quer entregar cronogramas e projetos vencedores, seu lugar é aqui!
Tenha em mãos um conteúdo completo e jamais visto na internet, que engloba todas as frentes da ferramenta de gerenciamento de projetos da Microsoft em um único lugar.


GERENCIAMENTO DE PROJETOS COM MS PROJECT
REGRAVADO EM 4K, COM NOVAS AULAS EXCLUSIVAS E ATUALIZADO PARA 2024, TOTALMENTE RENOVADO!
O novo conteúdo inclui planilha de gestão de riscos, novos modelos de relatórios, novos filtros, novos recursos e como corrigir o "erro" dos indicadores de Análise de Valor Agregado que não aceitam recursos de tipo custo de forma nativa. Agora você conseguirá gerenciar os indicadores de Valor Agregado de forma correta e confiável, utilizando os campos que desenvolvi para corrigir o problema.


OBS: CONTEÚDO EM 4K MEDIANTE DISPONIBILIDADE DA UDEMY. CASO NÃO CONSIGA ASSISTIR EM 4K NA PLATAFORMA, IREI PUBLICAR O MESMO CURSO EM UMA ÁREA DE MEMBROS EXCLUSIVA, ÀQUELES QUE SE INTERESSAREM PELO MATERIAL EM ALTA RESOLUÇÃO.
ACESSE CANAL DO YOUTUBE E ASSISTA O 1º MÓDULO GRÁTIS: @RubensdoCarmoNoYoutube


Este curso ensina como planejar e controlar cronogramas, recursos e orçamentos de projetos utilizando o Microsoft Project, uma das ferramentas de gerenciamento de projetos mais populares do mercado corporativo, em sua versão mais atual. O curso está alinhado às melhores práticas de Gerenciamento de Projetos do PMI (Project Management Institute) e irá capacitar profissionais que buscam certificação PMP, ou profissionais envolvidos no gerenciamento, coordenação, liderança e participação em projetos de diversos segmentos.


PROJECT KPI - CRIE FARÓIS E INDICADORES NO MS PROJECT
Aprenda a criar fórmulas e indicadores personalizados no Ms Project utilizando exemplos práticos, que poderão ser executados imediatamente. Além disso, crie um dashboard para realizar o acompanhamento do que se passa em seus projetos, auxiliando nas tomadas de decisão.


04 - PROJECT SCRUM - GERENCIE PROJETOS ÁGEIS NO MS PROJECT
Novas recursos foram lançados no Project para planejar Sprints, gerir Kanbans e outros. Neste curso iremos explorar todos estes benefícios, utilizando técnicas e novos campos para trabalhar projetos ágeis, como conversão de esforço em Story Points, painel de relatórios, status do kanban e do sprint, burndown e mto mais!


EXTRAS:
OBS: Conteúdos extras promocionais podem ser alterados ou removidos pelo instrutor a qualquer momento.


Quem é o professor?
Rubens do Carmo é publicitário e administrador de empresas, certificado Black Belt em Lean Seis Sigma e gerente de projetos de eventos com mais de 16 anos de experiência em projetos de eventos de larga escala. Mais de 50 mil alunos já realizaram seus cursos na plataforma de ensino a distância Udemy, o que faz dele um dos maiores instrutores e autoridades em Microsoft Project no Brasil.
target_audience: Profissionais envolvidos no gerenciamento, coordenação, liderança ou participação em projetos de diversos segmentos.
Estudantes de Administração, Engenharia, Eventos, Gestão de Projetos e/ou qualquer curso que tenha a necessidade de gerenciar projetos de qualquer espécie em seu dia a dia de forma prática e eficaz.

Bu eğitim PMI proje yönetim metodolojisinin anlatıldığı ve 2021 yılında duyrulan yeni PMP sınavına hazırlık müfredatı ile uyumlu bir eğitimdir. Bu alanda Türkçe olarak hazırlanan en kapsayıcı kurstur. Kursun içeriğinde PMP sınavına hazırlık çerçevesinde ihtiyaç duyabileceğiniz tüm konular PMBOK 7.0 ile uyumu bir şekilde anlatılmıştır.
Eğitim içerisinde PMP'yi geçmeniz için bilmeniz gereken tüm konular adım adım, anlaşılması kolay bir şekilde ele alınmıştır. Bu eğitim sadece PMP sınavı hazırlık için değil aynı zamanda proje yönetimi bilginizi arttırıp proje yöneticisi olmak için de kullanabilirsiniz.
Bu eğitim Yeni PMP Sınavı İçerik Taslağı 2021'e dayanmaktadır.
Eğitim, Geleneksel/Tahminedilebilir+ Hibrit + Çevik Proje Yönetimi + Performans Alanlarını (PMBOK 7) kapsar.
Eğitim, sade, açık ve yalın bir dil ile anlatılan yüksek kaliteli videolardan oluşmaktadır.
Eğitimde anlatılan PMBOK içeriği, temel proje yönetim bilgilerini, süreç gruplarını, bilgi alanlarını ve performans alanlarını ayrıntılı olarak kapsar.
Bu eğitim aynı zamanda CAPM sınavına hazırlanmak için de kullanabilir.
Eğitim İçeriği:
Eğitimde yeni PMP sınavı müfredatının gerektirdiği tüm konuları ele alacağız.
1. Geleneksel / TahminEdilebilir Proje Yönetimi
PMP sınavına hazırlanan biri olarak veya Profesyonel bir proje yöneticisi olarak bilmeniz gereken geleneksel / tahminedilebilir proje yönetiminin tüm önemli kavramları, aşamaları ve bilgi alanları anlatılmıştır.

Curso rápido e prático sobre o framework de gerenciamento de projetos Scrum.
Coloca o aluno em uma situação prática com o uso da ferramenta gratuita Trello. Onde o aluno irá poder gerir seus projetos, assim como todos os envolvidos no projeto poderão participar dando mais transparência na gestão do projeto sem necessitar o investimento em uma ferramenta paga e complexa para isso.

[BONUS] Préparez la certification PSM (P: [BONUS] Préparez la certification PSM (Professional Scrum Master)

requirements: Être ouvert d’esprit et être prêt à passer à l’action.
courses.description:
Programme complet sur la gestion de projet Scrum
Cette formation contient tout ce que vous devez savoir pour gérer des projets suivant le cadre de travail Scrum.
Dans cette formation, je partage avec vous les bases de Scrum, ses valeurs et ses principes. Vous apprendrez aussi à le mettre en place dans votre organisation.
Mon objectif à travers cette formation est de vous aider à relever les challenges que représente la transformation Agile.
Je vous expliquerai en quoi la méthode de gestion de projet Agile est différente des méthodes traditionnelles du type Waterfall.
Nous verrons en détails le cadre de travail Scrum.
Vous apprendrez à exprimer les besoins clients à travers des User Story claires et concises.
À la fin de cette formation, vous aurez les connaissances clés nécessaires pour travailler en Scrum au sein de votre entreprise.
Enfin, je vous donnerai des ressources et des quiz pour préparer la certification Professional Scrum Master (PSM).
Vous trouverez aussi des exemples et des exercices pratiques pour illustrer chaque point.
Voici quelques témoignages venants de participants à mes cours :
« Je suis content de pouvoir écouter des personnes comme Jamal. C’est concret, il va à l'essentiel, il y a un véritable partage, c'est précis et surtout on sent qu'il sait de quoi il parle avec une belle préparation en amont. Je ne peux que recommander cette formation car c'est clairement un investissement à faire ! ». Salahddine
« Agréablement surpris par ce cours, j'ai appris plein de choses. Du coup, grosse remise en question qui tombe au meilleur moment dans ma vie. Très motivant ! » Nicolas
« Merci pour le concret, la clarté et la synthèse ! ». Lyne
_________________________________________
Pourquoi rejoindre cette formation sur Scrum ?

Si vous voulez apprendre ce qu’est le cadre de travail Scrum ?
Si vous voulez connaitre les différents rôles et événements Scrum ?
Ou si vous voulez apprendre comment implémenter Scrum au sein de votre équipe ?
Cette formation est pour vous !
Scrum est la méthodologie Agile la plus utilisée dans le monde de l’entreprise. Des entreprises comme Amazon, Google, Microsoft, IBM, Paypal, Spotify, Twitter et j’en passe… utilisent Scrum.
Elle est simple à comprendre et apporte de grands bénéfices. Mais c’est sa mise en pratique qui est difficile.
Plusieurs entreprises pensent travailler en Scrum. Mais en réalité elles ne font qu’alourdir leur processus avec des réunions et de nouveaux rôles, sans forcément profiter des bénéfices qu’apporte Scrum.
Que vous soyez développeur, chef de projet ou chef de produit, connaitre les subtilités de Scrum est indispensable pour pouvoir profiter au maximum de ce cadre de travail.
Alors, prenez les devants et formez-vous.
Vous n’avez pas besoin de deviner, voici juste quelques compétences que vous allez acquérir à la fin de cette formation :
Maîtrisez les bases du cadre de travail Scrum
Découvrez le pouvoir de Scrum dans la gestion de projet complexe
Comprenez les différents rôles Scrum (PO, SM, Dev)
Découvrez les 5 événements du cycle de développement Scrum
Découvrez comment réussir la mise en de place de Scrum dans votre équipe
Évaluez la progression de votre équipe vers les objectifs
Préparez-vous à la certification PSM (Professional Scrum Master)
Et bien plus encore
Ce n’est pas un cours théorique, les techniques je partage avec vous, vous pouvez les mettre immédiatement en application et aussi voir des résultats. Tout au long de la formation, vous trouverez des quiz pour vérifier vos connaissances.
Maintenant, si vous êtes prêt à découvrir le cadre de travail Scrum, je vous dis à tout de suite à l’intérieur.
target_audience: Cette formation s’adresse à vous si vous voulez apprendre les bases de la gestion de projet Agile.
Si vous voulez connaitre la méthodologie Scrum.
Si vous voulez apprendre à travailler en Scrum et l’implémenter au sein de votre équipe.

courses.title: Hybrid Work: Performance, Communication, and Collaboration
courses.bio: A Practical Guide to Leading, Communicating, and Succeeding in Today’s Hybrid Workplaces
requirements: Basic understanding of workplace dynamics - Familiarity with how teams typically operate in an office or remote setting.
courses.description:
Welcome to Hybrid Work: Performance, Communication, and Collaboration—a comprehensive course designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge to excel in today’s dynamic hybrid work environments. Whether you’re a team leader, manager, HR professional, or team member, this course offers practical guidance on navigating the complexities of balancing remote and in-office work. You’ll gain essential leadership abilities tailored for hybrid settings, learn the basics of managing your time effectively, and understand how to create flexible work guidelines that promote both productivity and employee satisfaction.


Lessons about:


Essential Leadership Abilities for Thriving in Hybrid Workplaces
The Basics of Managing Your Time Effectively
Boosting Team Productivity While Reducing Burnout Risk
Creating and Guiding Top-Performing Teams
Practical Strategies to Manage Stress in a Demanding Work Life
Flexible Work Guidelines
Engaged Listening Understanding What Your Team Is Really Saying


and more.


Throughout the course, you’ll explore proven strategies to boost team productivity while reducing burnout risk, build and guide high-performing teams that excel regardless of location, and develop practical stress management techniques for demanding work lives. Communication is a cornerstone of successful hybrid work, so you’ll also master engaged listening skills that help you truly understand what your team members are saying, fostering deeper connection, trust, and collaboration across dispersed teams.
By the end of this course, you’ll be prepared to lead with confidence, communicate clearly, and implement collaborative practices that drive success in any hybrid work model. You’ll have actionable tools and insights to build a resilient, high-performing team culture that thrives in flexible work environments. Join us on this journey to transform the way you work and lead in the future of work.
target_audience: Team leaders and managers who want to effectively guide hybrid teams and boost productivity.
HR professionals tasked with designing or refining hybrid work policies and culture.
Employees transitioning to hybrid or remote work seeking to improve communication and collaboration skills.
Business owners and executives aiming to implement successful hybrid work models.

courses.description:
Clear the PMP® exam with ‘Above Target’ in all domains.
This course is to help all PMP® aspirants who are preparing for the coveted exam. This course is one of the courses in the series of our free courses on important topics from the PMP® examination perspective. We have covered various aspects of the PMP® examination relevant topics in different courses. They all will help you ace the important topics and become confident about your exam. The topics are aligned to the new PMP® examination introduced in January, 2021.
PMP® examination is one of most popular exams in the world that tests candidates in various topics related to all different knowledge domains related to project management. It is must for project managers to enhance their expertise as well as to advance their career to the next level.
Earned Value Management (EVM) is a brilliant technique to evaluate your project health at various check points in terms of cost and schedule. This technique is amazingly practically relatable and it is not helpful for exam but it is also helpful in improving our cost efficiency in projects at work and even at home.
Happy learning and good luck to all!

【本コースのゴール】
チェンジマネジメントの位置づけ、目的、方法を理解することです

【コース概要】
組織変革やDXにおいて、進め方がわからないことや、抵抗にあって施策が浸透しないということでお困りではありませんか？


組織変革やDXを進めるためにはチェンジマネジメント（変革マネジメント）が必須です。


この講座ではチェンジマネジメントのプロセスについて、実際の事例も交えて分かりやすく説明します。


明日から実務で使えるチェンジマネジメントのスキルを身につけましょう！


【本コースの内容】
セクション１ はじめに本コースの効率的な受講方法などが分かります。

セクション３ チェンジマネジメントの歴史と当コースのチェンジマネジメントのプロセスの全体像が理解できます。


セクション４ チェンジマネジメントのプロセスである「チーム設立」について説明します。


セクション５ チェンジマネジメントのプロセスである「施策立案・計画」について説明します。


セクション６ チェンジマネジメントのプロセスである「周知・説得」について説明します。


セクション7 チェンジマネジメントのプロセスである「短期成果創出」と「本格展開」について説明します。


セクション8 チェンジマネジメントの事例について紹介します。


セクション9 おわりに今後の学習方法などについてお伝えします。


ご興味がわいた方は、下のカリキュラムやプレビュー画面をご覧ください。


実際にコースでお会いできることを楽しみにしています！

courses.description:
O Project Server é uma ferramenta de PPM (Project Portfolio Management) que possui milhões de usuários no mundo todo e está presente em grandes corporações como Intel, Tesla, Amazon, Netflix, Jaguar, 21st Century Fox, Toyota, American Express, BMW, 3M e muito mais!
Talvez você não o conheça, mas os profissionais PMP e gestores de mais alto nível em gerenciamento de projetos atuam com esta ferramenta que é uma expansão do aclamado Microsoft Project Professional. Com ela você poderá gerenciar o Portfólio de Projetos da empresa, realizando melhores escolhas e priorizando somente os projetos que realmente trazem resultados. Além disso, a gestão dos Recursos Empresariais e a colaboração com as equipes chegam a um novo patamar onde não é possível encontrar na ferramenta tradicional de desktop, o Project Professional.
Para se tornar um profissional de gerenciamento de projetos completo e diferenciado, é preciso atuar nas diversas áreas de conhecimento e liderar sua equipe com a estrutura e conhecimento para selecionar os projetos corretos, comunicar e entregar os resultados desejados. Este curso será seu próximo passo para atingir este nível!


Quem é o professor?
Rubens do Carmo é publicitário e administrador de empresas, certificado Black Belt em Lean Seis Sigma, gerente de projetos e diretor executivo na empresa ATO3, com mais de 12 anos de experiência gerindo projetos de eventos. Mais de 35 mil alunos já realizaram um de seus cursos na plataforma de ensino a distância Udemy, o que faz dele um dos maiores instrutores e autoridades em Microsoft Project no Brasil.
target_audience: Gerentes de Projetos e Portfólio em empresas de qualquer tamanho e segmento;
Gerentes de Recursos em empresas de qualquer tamanho;
Profissionais envolvidos no gerenciamento, coordenação, liderança ou participação em projetos de diversos segmentos.

courses.title: Become a Scrum Guru the Easiest Way: Ultimate Scrum Guide
courses.bio: The best online source for becoming a cert. scrum master & gaining knowledge of a popular agile way to manage projects
requirements: Have basic knowledge of the Agile methodology
courses.description:
Scrum is by far the most popular of the Agile frameworks for developing complex products. This course provides a working knowledge of the Scrum framework — the underlying principles, practices, techniques and skills necessary for you to succeed as a Scrum Master. If you are already on a Scrum team you will learn how to become a change agent to help your team achieve a higher level of success.
During the development of this course, my main focus remained on making this learning process easy and fun. I like teaching with a straight-to-the-point/no-fluff approach. This course has a good mix of video lectures, pdf guides, and quizzes in order to help you understand the objectives.
The course is a little over 1.5 hours and will also include resources for you to help out with the certification! I will eventually add practice exam questions as we progress in this class. There are several exercise files included in this course and more resources will be added on a weekly basis. You will go through the following 7 sections:
1. What is Scrum?
2. What are the 3 Scrum Roles?
3. What is the Process?
4. What are the 4 Scrum Ceremonies?
5. What are the 3 Artifacts of Scrum?
6. What are the 5 Values of Scrum?
7. What are the Top Scrum Terms?
By the end of this course you will be able to:
Describe the Scrum framework to others
roles and responsibilities
use of each artifact
purpose of each meeting/ceremony
Explain the difference between the Scrum framework and other processes and systems
contrast with Waterfall
contrast ScrumMaster role with traditional roles
contrast the Scrum product backlog with traditional requirements
Be a successful Scrum Master for a Scrum team
be a change agent leader
facilitate each type of Scrum meeting
know how to detect and correct potential impediments to Scrum success
help a team adopt Scrum or improve their use of Scrum
have conversations about process, structures and values
use several conflict resolution techniques
Help a Scrum team plan successfully
plan a release
plan a sprint
create/maintain a prioritized product backlog
target_audience: Anyone who works on or with a Scrum team, or wants to learn what Scrum is all about
Executives, Managers, Programmers, Testers, Product Owners, Scrum Masters, Project Managers, Product Managers, Analysts, UI Designers, Architects, etc
Anyone responsible for a successful use and/or roll out of Scrum in a project/enterprise

requirements: holders middle school education (secondary) must provide 7,500 hours practical experience in the field of project management is equivalent to five years of field experience + training course duration of 35 hours dependent (ie training course mesh is required in the training center)

holders Supreme Qualifications 4 years and over must provide a 4500-hour practical experience in the field of Project Management is equivalent to three years of field experience + training course duration of 35 hours dependent (ie training course mesh is required in the training center)
courses.description:
PMP  Preparation Course By Processes Groups With Pr-axis Case Study According to PMBOK 5th, In This Course we will Study 47 processes of Project Management in 5 Processes Groups
Initiating Process Group

The Initiating Process Group consists of those processes performed to define a new project or a new phase of an existing project by obtaining authorization to start the project or phase.
Within the Initiating processes, the initial scope is defined and initial financial resources are committed.
Internal and external stakeholders who will interact and influence the overall outcome of the project are identified.
If not already assigned, the project manager will be selected.
This information is captured in the project charter and stakeholder register.
When the project charter is approved, the project becomes officially authorized.
Although the project management team may help write the project charter, this standard assumes that business case assessment, approval, and funding are handled externally to the project boundaries .
A project boundary is defined as the point in time at which the start or completion of the project or a project phase is authorized. The key purpose of this Process Group is to align the stakeholders’ expectations with the project’s purpose, give them visibility about the scope and objectives, show how their participation in the project and it associated phases can ensure that their expectations are achieved.
These processes help set the vision of the project—what is needed to be accomplished.


Planning Process Group

The Planning Process Group consists of those processes performed to establish the total scope of the effort, define and refine the objectives, and develop the course of action required to attain those objectives.
The Planning processes develop the project management plan and the project documents that will be used to carry out the project.
The complex nature of project management may require the use of repeated feedback loops for additional analysis.
As more project information or characteristics are gathered and understood, additional planning will likely be required.
Significant changes occurring throughout the project life cycle trigger a need to revisit one or more of the planning processes and possibly some of the initiating processes.
This progressive detailing of the project management plan is called progressive elaboration, indicating that planning and documentation are iterative and ongoing activities.
The key benefit of this Process Group is to delineate the strategy and tactics as well as the course of action or path to successfully complete the project or phase.
When the Planning Process Group is well managed, it is much easier to get stakeholder buy-in and engagement. These processes express how this will be done, setting the route to the desired objective.
Executing Process Group

The Executing Process Group consists of those processes performed to complete the work defined in the project management plan to satisfy the project specifications.
This Process Group involves coordinating people and resources, managing stakeholder expectations, as well as integrating and performing the activities of the project in accordance with the project management plan.
During project execution, results may require planning updates and relining.
This may include changes to expected activity duration's, changes in resource productivity and availability, and unanticipated risks. Such variances may affect the project management plan or project documents and may require detailed analysis and development of appropriate project management responses.
The results of the analysis can trigger change requests that, if approved, may modify the project management plan or other project documents and possibly require establishing new baselines.
A large portion of the project’s budget will be expended in performing the Executing Process Group processes.
Monitoring and Controlling Process Group

The Monitoring and Controlling Process Group consists of those processes required to track, review, and orchestrate the progress and performance of the project; identify any areas in which changes to the plan are required; and initiate the corresponding changes.
The key benefit of this Process Group is that project performance is measured and analyzed at regular intervals, appropriate events, or exception conditions to identify variances from the project management plan.
Controlling changes and recommending corrective or preventive action in anticipation of possible problems,
Monitoring the ongoing project activities against the project management plan and the project performance measurement baseline
Influencing the factors that could circumvent integrated change control or configuration management so only approved changes are implemented.
Closing Process Group
The Closing Process Group consists of those processes performed to conclude all activities across all Project Management Process Groups to formally complete the project, phase, or contractual obligations.
This Process Group, when completed, verifies that the defined processes are completed within all of the Process Groups to close the project or a project phase, as appropriate, and formally establishes that the project or project phase is complete.
target_audience: Project Managers

courses.title: User Story beherrschen: Agile Anforderungen meistern
courses.bio: Lerne den agilen Umgang mit User Stories. Die existenzielle Fähigkeit für Product Owner, Entwickler und Scrum Master.
objectives: Du kannst User Stories anwenden
Du kannst agil Anforderungen verwalten

Was sind User Stories?: Kernidee: Eine Methode für alle Detailgrade
Elemente einer guten User Story: Praxis: Rollen für das Produkt erstellen
Tipps zum Umsetzen von User Stories: Vor dem Umsetzen einer Story: Reden
Praxis: Tasks für die wichtigsten Stories
BONUS: Hier gibt es tolle Angebote von m: Bonus: TeamUp! für dein agiles Team

requirements: Interesse an agilem Arbeiten
Zettel und Stift
courses.description:
User Stories ist das Mittel, um modern und agil Anforderungen aufzunehmen und zu verwalten. Egal ob SCRUM, Extreme Programming (XP) oder andere moderne Vorgehen zur Softwareentwicklung - sie benutzen immer häufiger User Stories für ihre Anforderungen.  Wie kommt dies?


"Der Erfolg von Projekten entscheidet sich schon mit den Anforderungen."
"60% aller Fehler in Software, geht auf falsche oder falsch verstandene Anforderungen zurück."


Zitate wie diese, machen die Wichtigkeit von guten Anforderungen und vorallem, ein Verständnis aller Projektbeteiligter der Anforderungen klar.
In klassischen Projekten werden Anforderungen vom Kunden im Lastenheft festgelegt. Im Pflichtenheft beschreiben die Entwickler dann, wie sie diese Anforderungen konkret umsetzen werden. Beides wird vor der eigentlichen Umsetzung geschrieben - und gleicht einem erschwerten "Stille-Post"-Spiel. Das Lastenheft enthält zwar die Leistungsmerkmale des Produkts, die unterbewussten Basismerkmale oder undenkbaren Begeisterungsmerkmale sind darin nicht zu finden. Trotzdem sind beide enorm wichtig für ein gelungenes Produkt. Mit diesen unvollständigen Informationen überlegen sich die Entwickler jetzt, wie sie das Produkt umsetzen wollen. Das ganze Produkt! Wahnsinn.
Diese Umsetzung wird dann, in einem für den Kunden unlesbaren, Dokument beschrieben. Dieses bildet eine Art Vertragsgrundlage.
Uff... das kann ja nicht gut gehen! Außer, man steckt enorm viel Energie, Zeit und Geld in eben diese Analyse - und redet. Reden ist der Schlüssel zum Erfolg.
Agil geht anders. Es stellt die klassischen Vorgehen auf den Kopf. Behält, was wichtig ist und schmeißt radikal weg, was unwichtig ist.


User Stories sind eine Aufforderung zum Reden. Sie sind keine scharfen Anforderungen - zumindest nicht am Anfang. Sie werden konkreter, je näher der Termin ihrer Umsetzung rückt. Konkrete Anforderungen werden "Just-In-Time" generiert. Die technischen Ausführungen aus dem Pflichtenheft entstehen dann, wenn die Entwickler sie auch umsetzen. Also, genau zu dem Zeitpunkt, wo den Entwicklern das meißte Wissen über das System vorliegt.


User Stories sind einfach. Für uns in Mitteleuropa manchmal zu einfach. Leider gilt hier immer noch der Spruch:
"Das Einfache gilt schnell als banal."
Dabei ist das Einfache enorm schwierig zu erreichen.
Kann eine Methode, die leicht zu verstehende Sätze auf kleine Pappkarten schreibt, besser funktionieren, als ein dickes Word-Dokument, dass lange zwischen Auftraggeber und Auftragnehmer hin und her gewandert ist - und voller kritischer und informativer Kommentaren steckt?
JA!
Wie, erfährst du in diesem Kurs.
Wir werden uns in die Methode der User Story einarbeiten. Hierbei wirst du die Möglichkeit haben, selbst ein Projekt anhand der User Stories zu erarbeiten.
Danach geht es tiefer in die Methode hinein. Es geht um die Konzepte und Ideen, die hinter einer User Story stecken. Wir werden Stories schneiden, schätzen und priorisieren. Du erfährst, was User Stories mit Amazon gemeinsam haben und was Kunden wirklich begeistert.
Schreib dich ein - du hast eine 30-Tage-Geld-zurück-Garantie.


Hier Stichpunkte aus dem Inhalt:
Die gute User Story
User Stories und SCRUM
Kunden, Nutzer und Entwickler
Kernidee: So spät wie möglich
Kernidee: Aufforderung zum Reden
Die 3 Cs
Akzeptanzkriterien
Einfach Epic
User Story schneiden
Persona erstellen
Outcome statt Output
Level of Detail
Stories gut formulieren
INVEST-Kriterien
Versteckte Kundenwünsche
Kano-Analyse
Definition of Done
Definition of Ready
User Stories schätzen
User Stories priorisieren
Spikes einsetzen
Akzeptanzkriterien testen
Bähm... ;)

requirements: Recommended background: Familiarity with probability/statistics
courses.description:
What is the course about? This course provides an introduction to transportation risk analysis.
What kind of materials are included? It covers risk management framework, and risk assessment concepts and methodologies using examples based on railroad hazardous materials transportation risk.
How long will the course take to complete? The lectures can be completed in about 3 hours. Students are highly encouraged to complete optional assignments specified in the lectures. This would require additional 2-10 hours, depending on the level of complexity of the student-chosen transportation risk scenario.
How is the course structured? There are a set of 5-15 minute video lectures with optional assignments. Students are encouraged to publish their assignments online (e.g. using Google Doc) and share the link using the Q&A board for specific lectures.
Why take this course? This course will provide an ultralight, express introduction to transportation risk. This course is particularly suitable for managers, planners, engineers, other professionals or students who are or will be involved in transportation supply chain. Upon completion of this course, students will feel comfortable to support a transportation risk analysis project. Additional resources are specified throughout the lectures if students want to learn more.
Level of instructor involvement/availability: Students are highly encouraged to post questions and comments, and respond to those from other students using the Q&A board. Instructor will check and address unanswered questions/comments at least weekly.
target_audience: Particularly suitable for managers, planners, engineers, other professionals or students who are or will be involved in transportation supply chain

courses.title: Advances of Project Management
courses.bio: Advances of Project Management - Covaci Brindusa
requirements: General management principles
courses.description:
Although mankind has always known the idea of projects, evidence of this being the works of art or the impressive constructions of various historical periods, the course of Project Management (PM), in its modern forms of manifestation, can establish its scientific landmarks in our century, being closely linked to technological, industrial, social development, but especially to the development of competition, in the context of the globalization of the business sector, the internationalization of the economic and social environment. In this dynamic and complex environment, the desire to make products or services as profitable and competitive as possible, which implies high performance and cost standards, but above all the management of production processes in the shortest possible time, gave rise to the need to ensure of advanced management methods and techniques, some extremely specialized, which defined the discipline of PM, as a branch of general management. Most of the investments or social development programs, financed from external funds, could be accessed mainly through projects, which determined that the PM experienced an explosion, both in terms of the specific notions used, but especially in terms of the methods and tools of things.
The course provides support for MBA students. The course was designed both for doctoral and postdoctoral students, as well as for bachelor's and master's students. The course also includes aspects related to the environment, such as pollution prevention, and sustainable development in the development of tools, methodologies, products, processes, and technologies. The course is adapted for the current context, in which project management has become emergent. These course notes aim to support students with a pragmatic perspective consistent with the current requirements of the allocated financing instruments, so that those who wish to participate in accessing these funds have the basic notions, as well as some specific skills for to go through the formal stages and to understand the informal mechanisms, the so-called "unwritten rules", of obtaining contracts financed from external funds.
target_audience: All levels

objectives: El participante comprenderá cómo dirigir un proyecto a través de casos reales los cuales ejemplifican la aplicación del estándar del PMI
El participante se preparará para poder mejorar su desempeño en poder acreditar las certificaciones PMP o CAPM según él decida para mejorar su perfil
El participante conocerá el ciclo de vida de dirección de proyectos definido por el PMI junto con todos sus procesos relacionados a estas etapas
El participante conocerá al 100% una práctica real de dirección de proyectos de una empresa madura y exitosa

requirements: Este curso no tiene requerimiento previo por ser un curso de fundamentos en dirección de proyectos
courses.description:
Planeación y ejecución de proyectos exitosos fue diseñado con el firme objetivo que el participante conozca un proceso real de dirección de proyectos de una empresa madura y exitosa. Para que este objetivo se cumple, el autor desarrolla un proyecto que fue real el cual aborda todos y cada uno de los procesos de dirección de proyectos.
El autor de este entrenamiento relaciona cada una de las etapas de este proyecto, con las etapas del ciclo de vida y procesos documentados en "La guía de dirección de proyectos (PMBoK Guide 6th Edition & 7th Edition) del Project Management Institute".
Este entrenamiento es una arma poderosa para todo aquel director de proyecto que quiera conocer la verdadera aplicación del estándar del PMI a un proyecto real y cómo es que este proyecto desarrollo todos los formatos de una práctica como lo es el Alcance del proyecto, Plan maestro del proyecto, "Work Breakdown Strurcture", cierre financiero, aceptación de usuario, lecciones aprendidas, entre otros.
Este entrenamiento ha sido galardonado desde el año 2005 y ha sido la piedra angular para muchas organizaciones en establecer las bases para la ceración de una oficina de proyectos que sirva a la organización como la guía para la cristalización de su misión y visión.
Actualmente el autor es el único en el continente americano en tener todas las certificaciones del Project Management Institute (20 certificaciones) y ha brindado este entrenamiento en formato presencial a más de 2,000 personas con su característico toque ameno ya que fue conductor de televisión de Grupo Multimedios en Monterrey, Nuevo León, México.
target_audience: Curso dirigido a gerentes, coordinadores y administradores de proyectos, miembros de equipos de trabajo y toda aquella persona relacionada en la responsabilidad de planear, ejecutar, controlar y cerrar proyectos de diferentes industrias.

courses.title: Agile : A concise Introduction
courses.bio: A concise overview of Agile principles

Introduction: Welcome to Agile: A concise Introduction
Example of Agile Environment - Building A Website
The Agile Manifesto: Why is The Agile Manifesto So Important

requirements: No prior experience is required to take this course however the following are typical reasons:
You want to deliver high quality products and services
You need to deal with rapidly changing requirements
You want to improve the performance of your team as a team member, product owner, development team member, service manager, business owner, scrum master, business analyst for business analysis
You want to improve or master agile practices through continuous improvement ( kaizen )
courses.description:
Three reasons to TAKE THIS COURSE right now!
The unique reasons for taking this course are:
Complete, Concise, Confident Overview of Agile principles - You will be confident that you have a complete overview of Agile principles as the founders intended it, because I only teach accurately based on the Agile Manifesto and Agile Principles.
Gain confidence in Agile basics  - I teach you the basics to gain confidence then without going into a class room or spending 1000s of Dollars.
You get ansers to frequently asked questions about agile!
Includes Narration from Randal Schaffer


What is Agile?

Agile is a mindset and an umbrella term for a set of related methods and frameworks that help us to deliver projects on time and more efficiently.  Based on my experience, it is the number one mindset used to deliver projects on time!


Who should take is course?
Whether you are a team member, business owner, scrum master, product owner, developer, business stakeholder or simply someone who wants to understand what makes agile tick, this is the place to start.  If you are preparing for an agile certification, this class is for you.


What will I learn?
In this class you will learn:
Concise overview of Agile - The exact mindset and principles  used to deliver a project using agile along with the history of Agile.


What are the pre-requisites?
This course is video based with no supporting document necessary.  I go through key gotchas based on the Agile Manefesto and Agile Principles created by the founders of Agile.


How is the course structured?
Each section features an overview of a particular aspect of Agile such as the Agile Manifesto and Agile Principles Inspired by God, the Bible, my mother and the founders of Agile
target_audience: Product Owners , Scrum Master , Software Developer , Business Owners , Product Manager , Support Teams, Quality Assurance (QA) Testers, Maintenance Teams, Service and Sales Teams, Development Support Teams

Someone preparing to work in a team that requires Continuous Delivery, User Stories, Acceptance Tests or Behaviour Driven Development. Anyone who wants to know how to be proficient with using Agile in Software Engineering or Software Testing
A candidate who wants answers to frequently misunderstood points about Agile or an expert candidate who wants a concise, quick refresher on Agile principles, practices and techniques
Someone who wants pointers on improving the delivery of their teams

courses.description:
品質管理とは、製品やサービスの品質を確保するための活動です。あらゆる仕事において、提供物の品質を安定したものにすることは重要なことです。


本講座では、最初に汎用的な品質管理についての理解を深めます。品質とは何か、保つためにはどうすれば良いのか、身近な例をつかって考えていきます。


次に情報システムの品質管理として、アプローチ方法や品質を確保する工程について学びます。


そして、品質管理を確実に実行するための運用、さらにはその評価と改善、品質管理に使う道具（視覚化手法）を理解していきます。


品質が悪いと、不良品が増えてお客様からの支持を失い、クレームや訴訟リスクが増加するなど大きな問題を引き起こします。その一方で品質がよいと、企業の信頼性が増し、競争力も高まります。


組織の品質を担う方の最初の学びとして、本講座をおすすめします。

Welcome to Agile 101: Unveiling the Agile Methodology
Dive into the world of Agile with this introductory course, perfect for those new to the concept. In less than an hour, Agile 101 offers a comprehensive overview of Agile methodologies, contrasting them with Lean and Waterfall, and guiding you through the paradigm shift towards more adaptive project management.

The foundational philosophies of Lean and Waterfall, setting the stage for Agile.
An in-depth look at Agile's core themes and how they represent a shift from traditional project management.

Insights into Agile's growth and its application in scaling to global enterprises.
Ideal for: Anyone seeking a succinct yet thorough introduction to Agile. This course is tailored for beginners, including project managers, developers, or anyone curious about modern project management techniques.
A Note from the Instructor: This course was extracted from the recording of a successful two-part webinar series (Lean 101 and Agile 101) I hosted, receiving fantastic feedback. Motivated by the positive response, I've transformed these sessions into this free Udemy course. While the visuals are straightforward, the focus is on delivering quality content that’s accessible and engaging. I realise that the videos are fairly rudimentary but I hope you find the material enlightening and sufficient for your learning needs.
Expand Your Agile Journey: After completing this course, don't let your learning stop. Take advantage of additional resources to deepen your Agile knowledge:

Interactive Learning with Agile AI Chatbot: Explore Agile principles further with my innovative AI chatbot.
Networking Opportunity: Connect with me on LinkedIn for continuous learning and professional growth.
Complementary Insights: Subscribe to my YouTube channel for ongoing Agile content.
Remember, these are available to all, just click on my profile page for links to my channels.
Enroll Now to unlock a foundational understanding of Agile methodologies and pave the way for further exploration into efficient project management practices. Remember, the journey to Agile mastery is ongoing, and I’m here to support you every step of the way through my Udemy profile and beyond.

requirements: Интерес к проектному менеджменту, либо опыт в роли участника или даже менеджера проекта
Желание изучить стандарт РМВОК-7 как современную основу для проектной работы
Владение офисным программным обеспечением Excel, Power Point, Word (либо аналоги, совместимые с этим ПО - могут открывать и работать с файлами этого типа)
Знание Excel: простые формулы\вычисления, работа с таблицами и хорошее знакомство с функционалом и настройкой основных диаграмм (круговая, столбиковая, график\временная линия, точечная).
courses.description:
Мировая практика управления проектами - в основе курса самая последняя версия стандарта управления проектами РМВОК7 от PMI.
Этот курс - это способ максимально быстро и пошагово ознакомиться с самой последней версии стандарта РМВОК-7 как одного из самых популярных в мире стандартом управления проектами
Помимо изучения стандарта PMBOK-7 в курс встроены фрагменты опыта создателя курса, который является автором популярной бизнес-литературы (в продаже в крупнейших онлайн магазинах: AMAZON, OZON, ЛитРес, RIDERO...), в том числе тематической книги "Трансформация: особенности управления проектами преобразований"
Это первый русскоязычный курс по  стандарту PMBoK7 (сделан на основе англ. оригинала задолго до публикации русскоязычной версии).
Автор курса сертифицированный менеджер проектов и входит в число 15 русскоязычных экспертов со всех территорий\республик СССР, сделавших весомый вклад в разработку новейшего стандарта РМВОК-7 от PMI (см. в списке контрибуторов на ст. 204 данного стандарта). Удостоен спецсертификата PMI за вклад в усиление и развитие области управления проектами.
В курсе освещены как классические каскадные подходы проектного управления, так и адаптивные (гибкие, Agile) - показаны их суть и особенности
Курс предназначен для широкого круга слушателей: как для новичков интересующихся проектным управлением, так  экспертов, желающих систематизировать и дополнить свой опыт. Этот курс не просто дает базовый минимум "для чайника" (в формате в стандарте говорится это и вот это), а обучает заземлению описанного в стандарте в практическую работу проектного менеджера.
Курс насыщен практическими заданиями (до 50 ЗАДАНИЙ!!!), которые не просто прорабатывают лекционный материал, а и позволяют слушателям шире и глубже понять как стандарт РМВОК-7, так и профессию менеджера проектов
Набор продуманных тестов (5 тестов) не только закрепляет и систематизирует пройденный материал, а и местами расширяет его понимание.
Кроме того, курс дает PDU к сертификации PMI \ PMP (PDU за сертификат курса + возможность получить доп. PDU на допматериалах и заданиях c конспектированием); а также CPD-часы к сертификации IPMA
Важно то, что курс НЕ ПРИВЯЗАН к конкретной предметной области: он систематизирует основные общие знания и навыки для управления проектами в любой сфере - соответственно для применения полученных знаний Вы должны хорошо ориентироваться в СВОЕЙ СОБСТВЕННОЙ ПРЕДМЕТНОЙ ОБЛАСТИ (отрасли, дисциплине, сфере, функции...), в которой собираетесь после обучения управлять проектами
Ну и в конце курса каждый студент получит 4 бонуса:
- книга Е.Ксенчука "Системное мышление";
- список избранных других курсов автора, которые расширяют экспертизу;
- а для тренеров по проектному управлению  флипчарт-лист для проведения офлайн тренинга по РМВОК7;
- ну и оригинальная pdf-версия РМВоК7 (на англ. языке)
Важно понимать, что РМВОК7 отошел от предоставления стандартизированных шаблонов проектной документации (поскольку они не везде универсальны и не всем отраслям и проектам подходят) - и в курсе также НЕ БУДЕТ универсальных шаблонов проектной документации. Тем не менее в качестве подспорья для новичков будут показаны примеры документов и дана возможность поработать с некоторыми из них. Если Вам просто нужны "готовые шаблоны подходящие именно Вам",  а не знания проектного управления - проходите мимо этого курса прямиком в Яндекс, Google или любой другой поисковик (их полно в Интернет - найдете шаблоны на свой "вкус и цвет").
Также в курсе НЕ БУДЕТ  изучения навыков работы с конкретным прикладным программным обеспечением (MS Project, Primavera, Wrike и т.д.)  - курс сфокусирован исключительно на общих знаниях и навыках в привязке к PMBOK7,  а не изучению программного обеспечения для управления проектами.
target_audience: Практики проектного менеджмента: опытные менеджеры проектов, желающие систематизировать знания или изучить стандарт РМВОК7
Планирующие пройти\обновить сертификацию по проектному менеджменту от PMI
Сотрудники РМО (офис управления проектами) корпораций
Руководители компаний, функций, бизнес-подразделений, сталкивающиеся в работе с проектной деятельностью
Профессионалы, участвующие в проектах и планирующие ближе познакомиться со сферой проектного менеджмента
Зрелые специалисты, планирующие сменить свою текущую профессию на профессию руководителя проектов и программ
Молодые профессионалы или выпускники ВУЗов, заинтересованные в карьере в сфере проектного менеджмента
Преподаватели и студенты дисциплин "Управление проектами", "Менеджмент организаций", "Бизнес-администрирование"
Тренера по проектному менеджменту
Консультанты, управляющие проектами для клиентов
Любой, кто заинтересован в знаниях и навыках проектного управления
